GP12vipce_pu:4348: viśvāmitras tathā rakṣo yajñopeto mahāmune // ViP_2,10.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:4349: māseṣv eteṣu maitreya vasanty ete tu saptakāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4351: stuvanti munayaḥ sūryaṃ gandharvair gīyate puraḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4352: nṛtyanty apsaraso yānti sūryasyānu niśācarāḥ // ViP_2,10.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:4359: yad etad bhagavān āha gaṇaḥ saptavidho raveḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4360: maṇḍale himatāpādeḥ kāraṇaṃ tan mayā śrutam // ViP_2,11.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:4364: kiṃ tvādityasya yat karma tan nātroktaṃ tvayā mune // ViP_2,11.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:4365: yadi saptagaṇo vāri himam uṣṇaṃ ca varṣati /
GP12vipce_pu:4366: tat kim atra raver yena vṛṣṭiḥ sūryād itīryate // ViP_2,11.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:4367: vivasvān udito madhye yāty astam iti kiṃ janaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4368: bravīty etat samaṃ karma yadi saptagaṇasya tat // ViP_2,11.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:4370: maitreya śrūyatām etad yad bhavān paripṛcchati /
GP12vipce_pu:4371: yathā saptagaṇe 'py ekaḥ prādhānyenādhiko raviḥ // ViP_2,11.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:4372: yā tu śaktiḥ parā viṣṇor ṛgyajuḥsāmasaṃjñitā /
GP12vipce_pu:4373: saiṣā trayī tapaty aṃho jagataś ca hinasti yat // ViP_2,11.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:4374: saiṣa viṣṇuḥ sthitaḥ sthityāṃ jagataḥ pālanodyataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4376: māsi māsi ravir yo yas tatra tatra hi sā parā /
GP12vipce_pu:4377: trayīmayī viṣṇuśaktir avasthānaṃ karoti vai // ViP_2,11.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:4378: ṛcas tapanti pūrvāhṇe madhyāhne ca yajūṃṣy atha /
GP12vipce_pu:4379: bṛhadrathantarādīni sāmāny ahnaḥ kṣaye ravau // ViP_2,11.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:4381: viṣṇuśaktir avasthānaṃ sadāditye karoti sā // ViP_2,11.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:4382: na kevalaṃ raveḥ śaktir vaiṣṇavī sā trayīmayī /
GP12vipce_pu:4383: brahmātha puruṣo rudras trayam etat trayīmayam // ViP_2,11.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:4384: sargādau ṛṅmayo brahmā sthitau viṣṇur yajurmayaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4385: rudraḥ sāmamayo 'ntāya tasmāt tasyāśucir dhvaniḥ // ViP_2,11.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:4386: evaṃ sā sāttvikī śaktir vaiṣṇavī yā trayīmayī /
GP12vipce_pu:4389: tamaḥ samastajagatāṃ nāśaṃ nayati cākhilam // ViP_2,11.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:4390: stuvanti taṃ vai munayo gandharvair gīyate puraḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4391: nṛtyanty apsaraso yānti tasya cānu niśācarāḥ // ViP_2,11.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:4395: viṣṇur viṣṇoḥ pṛthak tasya gaṇaḥ saptavidho 'py ayam // ViP_2,11.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:4398: evaṃ sā vaiṣṇavī śaktir naivāpaiti tato dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:4399: māsānumāsaṃ bhāsvantam adhyāste tatra saṃsthitam // ViP_2,11.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:4402: sūryaraśmiḥ suṣumṇo yas tarpitas tena candramāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4403: kṛṣṇapakṣe 'maraiḥ śaśvat pīyate vai sudhāmayaḥ // ViP_2,11.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:4404: pītaṃ taṃ dvikalaṃ somaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣakṣaye dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:4405: pibanti pitaras teṣāṃ bhāskarāt tarpaṇaṃ tathā // ViP_2,11.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:4406: ādatte raśmibhir yaṃ tu kṣitisaṃsthaṃ rasaṃ raviḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4407: tam utsṛjati bhūtānāṃ puṣṭyarthaṃ sasyavṛddhaye // ViP_2,11.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:4408: tena prīṇāty aśeṣāṇi bhūtāni bhagavān raviḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4410: pakṣatṛptiṃ tu devānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ caiva māsikīm /
GP12vipce_pu:4411: śaśvat tṛptiṃ ca martyānāṃ maitreyārkaḥ prayacchati // ViP_2,11.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:4414: rathas tricakraḥ somasya kundābhās tasya vājinaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4415: vāmadakṣiṇato yuktā daśa tena caraty asau // ViP_2,12.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:4417: hrāsavṛddhikramas tasya raśmīnāṃ savitur yathā // ViP_2,12.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:4418: arkasyeva hi tasyāśvāḥ sakṛdyuktā vahanti te /
GP12vipce_pu:4420: kṣīṇaṃ pītaṃ suraiḥ somam āpyāyayati dīptimān /
GP12vipce_pu:4422: krameṇa yena pīto 'sau devais tena niśākaram /
GP12vipce_pu:4425: pibanti devā maitreya sudhāhārā yato 'marāḥ // ViP_2,12.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:4427: trayas triṃśat tathā devāḥ pibanti kṣaṇadākaram // ViP_2,12.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:4429: amākhyaraśmau vasati amāvāsyā tataḥ smṛtā // ViP_2,12.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:4430: apsu tasminn ahorātre pūrvaṃ viśati candramāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4431: tato vīrutsu vasati prayāty arkaṃ tataḥ kramāt // ViP_2,12.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:4432: chinatti vīrudho yas tu vīrutsaṃsthe niśākare /
GP12vipce_pu:4433: patraṃ vā pātayaty ekaṃ brahmahatyāṃ sa vindati // ViP_2,12.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:4436: pibanti dvikalaṃ somaṃ śiṣṭā tasya kalā tu yā /
GP12vipce_pu:4437: sudhāmṛtamayī puṇyā tām indoḥ pitaro mune // ViP_2,12.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:4440: saumyā barhiṣadaś caiva agniṣvāttāś ca te tridhā // ViP_2,12.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:4441: evaṃ devān site pakṣe kṛṣṇapakṣe tathā pitṝn /
GP12vipce_pu:4446: piśaṅgais turagair yuktaḥ so 'ṣṭābhir vāyuvegibhiḥ // ViP_2,12.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:4448: sopāsaṅgapatākas tu śukrasyāpi ratho mahān // ViP_2,12.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:4449: aṣṭāśvaḥ kāñcanaḥ śrīmān bhaumasyāpi ratho mahān /
GP12vipce_pu:4451: aṣṭābhiḥ pāṇḍarair yuktair vājibhiḥ kāñcane rathe /
GP12vipce_pu:4452: tasmiṃs tiṣṭhati varṣaṃ vai rāśau rāśau bṛhaspatiḥ // ViP_2,12.19 //
GP12vipce_pu:4454: samāruhya śanair yāti mandagāmī śanaiścaraḥ // ViP_2,12.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:4455: svarbhānos turagā hy aṣṭau bhṛṅgābhā dhūsaraṃ ratham /
GP12vipce_pu:4456: sakṛdyuktās tu maitreya vahanty avirataṃ sadā // ViP_2,12.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:4457: ādityān niḥsṛto rāhuḥ somaṃ gacchati parvasu /
GP12vipce_pu:4458: ādityam eti somāc ca punaḥ saureṣu parvasu // ViP_2,12.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:4461: ete mayā grahāṇāṃ vai tavākhyātā rathā nava /
GP12vipce_pu:4462: sarve dhruve mahābhāga prabaddhā vāyuraśmibhiḥ // ViP_2,12.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:4465: yāvantyaś caiva tārās tās tāvanto vātaraśmayaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4466: sarve dhruve nibaddhās te bhramanto bhrāmayanti tam // ViP_2,12.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:4467: tailapīḍā yathā cakraṃ bhramanto bhrāmayanti vai /
GP12vipce_pu:4468: tathā bhramanti jyotīṃṣi vātaviddhāni sarvaśaḥ // ViP_2,12.27 //
GP12vipce_pu:4470: yasmāj jyotīṃṣi vahati pravahas tena sa smṛtaḥ // ViP_2,12.28 //
GP12vipce_pu:4471: śiśumāras tu yaḥ proktaḥ sa dhruvo yatra tiṣṭhati /
GP12vipce_pu:4472: saṃniveśaṃ ca tasyāpi śṛṇuṣva munisattama // ViP_2,12.29 //
GP12vipce_pu:4473: yad ahnā kurute pāpaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ niśi mucyate /
GP12vipce_pu:4474: yāvantyaś caiva tārās tāḥ śiśumārāśritā divi /
GP12vipce_pu:4475: tāvanty eva tu varṣāṇi jīvaty abhyadhikāni ca // ViP_2,12.30 //
GP12vipce_pu:4476: uttānapādas tasyātha vijñeyo hy uttaro hanuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4477: yajño 'dharaś ca vijñeyo dharmo mūrdhānam āśritaḥ // ViP_2,12.31 //
GP12vipce_pu:4479: varuṇaś cāryamā caiva paścime tasya sakthinī // ViP_2,12.32 //
GP12vipce_pu:4480: śiśnaṃ saṃvatsaras tasya mitro 'pānaṃ samāśritaḥ // ViP_2,12.33 //
GP12vipce_pu:4481: pucche 'gniś ca mahendraś ca kaśyapo 'tha tato dhruvaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4482: tārakā śiśumārasya nāstam eti catuṣṭayam // ViP_2,12.34 //
GP12vipce_pu:4483: ity eṣa saṃniveśo yaḥ pṛthivyā jyotiṣāṃ tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:4484: dvīpānām udadhīnāṃ ca parvatānāṃ ca kīrtitaḥ // ViP_2,12.35 //
GP12vipce_pu:4485: varṣāṇāṃ ca nadīnāṃ ca ye ca teṣu vasanti vai /
GP12vipce_pu:4486: teṣāṃ svarūpam ākhyātaṃ saṃkṣepāc chrūyatāṃ punaḥ // ViP_2,12.36 //
GP12vipce_pu:4487: yad ambu vaiṣṇavaḥ kāyas tato vipra vasuṃdharā /
GP12vipce_pu:4489: jyotīṃṣi viṣṇur bhuvanāni viṣṇur vanāni viṣṇur girayo diśaś ca /
GP12vipce_pu:4490: nadyaḥ samudrāś ca sa eva sarvaṃ yad asti yan nāsti ca vipravarya // ViP_2,12.38 //
GP12vipce_pu:4491: jñānasvarūpo bhagavān yato 'sāv aśeṣamūrtir na tu vastubhūtaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4492: tato hi śailābdhidharādibhedāñ jānīhi vijñānavijṛmbhitāni // ViP_2,12.39 //
GP12vipce_pu:4493: yadā tu śuddhaṃ nijarūpi sarvaṃ karmakṣaye jñānam apāstadoṣam /
GP12vipce_pu:4494: tadā hi saṃkalpataroḥ phalāni bhavanti no vastuṣu vastubhedāḥ // ViP_2,12.40 //
GP12vipce_pu:4495: vastv asti kiṃ kutracid ādimadhya paryantahīnaṃ satataikarūpam /
GP12vipce_pu:4496: yac cānyathātvaṃ dvija yāti bhūyo na tat tathā tatra kuto hi tattvam // ViP_2,12.41 //
GP12vipce_pu:4497: mahī ghaṭatvaṃ ghaṭataḥ kapālikā kapālikā cūrṇarajas tato 'ṇuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4498: janaiḥ svakarmastimitātmaniścayair ālakṣyate brūhi kim atra vastu // ViP_2,12.42 //
GP12vipce_pu:4499: tasmān na vijñānam ṛte 'sti kiṃcit kvacit kadācid dvija vastujātam /
GP12vipce_pu:4500: vijñānam ekaṃ nijakarmabheda vibhinnacittair bahudhābhyupetam // ViP_2,12.43 //
GP12vipce_pu:4502: ekaṃ sadaikaṃ paramaḥ pareśaḥ sa vāsudevo na yato 'nyad asti // ViP_2,12.44 //
GP12vipce_pu:4503: sadbhāva eṣo bhavato mayokto jñānaṃ yathā satyam asatyam anyat /
GP12vipce_pu:4504: etat tu yat saṃvyavahārabhūtaṃ tatrāpi coktaṃ bhuvanāśritaṃ te // ViP_2,12.45 //
GP12vipce_pu:4505: yajñaḥ paśur vahnir aśeṣa-ṛtvik somaḥ surāḥ svargamayaś ca kāmaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4506: ityādikarmāśritamārgadṛṣṭaṃ bhūrādibhogāś ca phalāni teṣām // ViP_2,12.46 //
GP12vipce_pu:4507: yac caitad bhuvanagataṃ mayā tavoktaṃ sarvatra vrajati hi karmavaśya ekaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4508: jñātvaivaṃ dhruvam acalaṃ sadaikarūpaṃ tat kuryād viśati hi yena vāsudevam // ViP_2,12.47 //
GP12vipce_pu:4511: bhagavan samyag ākhyātaṃ yat pṛṣṭo 'si mayākhilam /
GP12vipce_pu:4514: paramārthaś ca me prokto yathā jñānaṃ pradhānataḥ // ViP_2,13.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:4515: yat tu tad bhagavān āha bharatasya mahīpateḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4516: kathayiṣyāmi caritaṃ tan mamākhyātum arhasi // ViP_2,13.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:4518: yogayuktaḥ samādhāya vāsudeve manaḥ sadā // ViP_2,13.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:4520: kathaṃ tu nābhavan muktir yadābhūt sa dvijaḥ punaḥ // ViP_2,13.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:4521: vipratve ca kṛtaṃ tena yad bhūyaḥ sumahātmanā /
GP12vipce_pu:4525: uvāsa suciraṃ kālaṃ maitreya pṛthivīpatiḥ // ViP_2,13.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:4527: avāpa paramāṃ kāṣṭhāṃ manasaś cāpi saṃyame // ViP_2,13.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:4529: kṛṣṇa viṣṇo hṛṣīkeśety āha rājā sa kevalam // ViP_2,13.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:4533: nānyaj jagāda maitreya kiṃcit svapnāntareṣv api /
GP12vipce_pu:4534: etat padaṃ tadarthaṃ ca vinā nānyad acintayat // ViP_2,13.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:4536: nānyāni cakre karmāṇi niḥsaṅgo yogatāpasaḥ // ViP_2,13.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:4538: sasnau tatra tadā cakre snānasyānantarakriyāḥ // ViP_2,13.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:4539: athājagāma tat tīrthaṃ jalaṃ pātuṃ pipāsitā /
GP12vipce_pu:4540: āsannaprasavā brahmann ekaiva hariṇī vanāt // ViP_2,13.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:4541: tataḥ samabhavat tatra pītaprāye jale tayā /
GP12vipce_pu:4543: tataḥ sā sahasā trāsād āplutā nimnagātaṭam /
GP12vipce_pu:4544: atyuccārohaṇenāsyā nadyāṃ garbhaḥ papāta saḥ // ViP_2,13.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:4546: jagrāha sa nṛpo garbhāt patitaṃ mṛgapotakam // ViP_2,13.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:4548: maitreya sāpi hariṇī papāta ca mamāra ca // ViP_2,13.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:4550: mṛgapotaṃ samādāya punar āśramam āgataḥ // ViP_2,13.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:4552: poṣaṇaṃ puṣyamāṇaś ca sa tena vavṛdhe mune // ViP_2,13.19 //
GP12vipce_pu:4554: dūraṃ gatvā ca śārdūlatrāsād abhyāyayau punaḥ // ViP_2,13.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:4555: prātar gatvātidūraṃ ca sāyam āyāt tadāśramam /
GP12vipce_pu:4558: āsīc cetaḥ samāsaktaṃ na yayāv anyato dvija // ViP_2,13.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:4560: mamatvaṃ sa cakāroccais tasmin hariṇabālake // ViP_2,13.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:4561: kiṃ vṛkair bhakṣito vyāghraiḥ kiṃ siṃhena nipātitaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4562: cirāyamāṇe niṣkrānte tasyāsīd iti mānasam // ViP_2,13.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:4568: kuśakāśā virājante baṭavaḥ sāmagā iva // ViP_2,13.27 //
GP12vipce_pu:4569: itthaṃ ciragate tasmin sa cakre mānasaṃ muniḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4574: mṛgapote 'bhavac cittaṃ sthairyavat tasya bhūpateḥ // ViP_2,13.30 //
GP12vipce_pu:4575: kālena gacchatā so 'tha kālaṃ cakre mahīpatiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4576: piteva sāsraṃ putreṇa mṛgapotena vīkṣitaḥ // ViP_2,13.31 //
GP12vipce_pu:4577: mṛgam eṣa tadādrākṣīt tyajan prāṇān asāv api /
GP12vipce_pu:4578: tanmayatvena maitreya nānyat kiṃcid acintayat // ViP_2,13.32 //
GP12vipce_pu:4579: tataś ca tatkālakṛtāṃ bhāvanāṃ prāpya tādṛśīm /
GP12vipce_pu:4580: jambūmārge mahāraṇye jajñe jātismaro mṛgaḥ // ViP_2,13.33 //
GP12vipce_pu:4582: vihāya mātaraṃ bhūyaḥ sālagrāmam upāyayau // ViP_2,13.34 //
GP12vipce_pu:4583: śuṣkais tṛṇais tathā parṇaiḥ sa kurvann ātmapoṣaṇam /
GP12vipce_pu:4586: sadācāravatāṃ śuddhe yogināṃ pravare kule // ViP_2,13.36 //
GP12vipce_pu:4588: apaśyat sa ca maitreya ātmānaṃ prakṛteḥ param // ViP_2,13.37 //
GP12vipce_pu:4590: sarvabhūtāny abhedena dadarśa sa mahāmatiḥ // ViP_2,13.38 //
GP12vipce_pu:4592: na dadarśa ca karmāṇi śāstrāṇi jagṛhe na ca // ViP_2,13.39 //
GP12vipce_pu:4596: klinnadantāntaraḥ sarvaiḥ paribhūtaḥ sa nāgaraiḥ // ViP_2,13.41 //
GP12vipce_pu:4597: saṃmānanā parāṃ hāniṃ yogarddheḥ kurute yataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4598: janenāvamato yogī yogasiddhiṃ ca vindati // ViP_2,13.42 //
GP12vipce_pu:4599: tasmāc careta vai yogī satāṃ dharmam adūṣayan /
GP12vipce_pu:4600: janā yathāvamanyeran gaccheyur naiva saṃgatim // ViP_2,13.43 //
GP12vipce_pu:4602: ātmānaṃ darśayām āsa jaḍonmattākṛtiṃ jane // ViP_2,13.44 //
GP12vipce_pu:4604: yad yad āpnoti subahu tad atte kālasaṃyamam // ViP_2,13.45 //
GP12vipce_pu:4614: adhiṣṭhitaṃ mahākālī jñātvā yogeśvaraṃ tadā // ViP_2,13.48*12:3 //
GP12vipce_pu:4615: tataḥ khaḍgaṃ samādāya niśitaṃ niśi sā tadā // ViP_2,13.48*12:4 //
GP12vipce_pu:4619: viṣṭikartātha taṃ tatra viṣṭiyogyo 'yam ity api // ViP_2,13.48*12:8 //
GP12vipce_pu:4621: sa rājā śibikārūḍho gantuṃ kṛtamatir dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:4623: śreyaḥ kim atra saṃsāre duḥkhaprāye nṛṇām iti /
GP12vipce_pu:4624: praṣṭuṃ taṃ mokṣadharmajñaṃ kapilākhyaṃ mahāmunim // ViP_2,13.50 //
GP12vipce_pu:4626: nṛṇāṃ viṣṭigṛhītānām anyeṣāṃ so 'pi madhyagaḥ // ViP_2,13.51 //
GP12vipce_pu:4628: jātismaro 'sau pāpasya kṣayakāma uvāha tām // ViP_2,13.52 //
GP12vipce_pu:4630: kurvan matimatāṃ śreṣṭhas te tv anye tvaritaṃ yayuḥ // ViP_2,13.53 //
GP12vipce_pu:4632: kim etad ity āha samaṃ gamyatāṃ śibikāvahāḥ // ViP_2,13.54 //
GP12vipce_pu:4633: punas tathaiva śibikāṃ vilokya viṣamāṃ hasan /
GP12vipce_pu:4634: nṛpaḥ kim etad ity āha bhavadbhir gamyate 'nyathā // ViP_2,13.55 //
GP12vipce_pu:4635: bhūpater vadatas tasya śrutvetthaṃ bahuśo vacaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4636: śibikodvāhakāḥ procur ayaṃ yātīty asatvaram // ViP_2,13.56 //
GP12vipce_pu:4638: kiṃ śrānto 'sy alpam adhvānaṃ tvayoḍhā śibikā mama /
GP12vipce_pu:4639: kim āyāsasaho na tvaṃ pīvān asi nirīkṣyase // ViP_2,13.57 //
GP12vipce_pu:4641: nāhaṃ pīvā na caivoḍhā śibikā bhavato mayā /
GP12vipce_pu:4642: na śrānto 'smi na cāyāsaḥ soḍhavyo 'sti mahīpate // ViP_2,13.58 //
GP12vipce_pu:4644: pratyakṣaṃ dṛśyase pīvān adyāpi śibikā tvayi /
GP12vipce_pu:4645: śramaś ca bhārodvahane bhavaty eva hi dehinām // ViP_2,13.59 //
GP12vipce_pu:4647: pratyakṣaṃ bhavatā bhūpa yad dṛṣṭaṃ mama tad vada /
GP12vipce_pu:4648: balavān abalaś ceti vācyaṃ paścād viśeṣaṇam // ViP_2,13.60 //
GP12vipce_pu:4649: tvayoḍhā śibikā ceti tvayy adyāpi ca saṃsthitā /
GP12vipce_pu:4650: mithyaitad atra tu bhavāñ śṛṇotu vacanaṃ mama // ViP_2,13.61 //
GP12vipce_pu:4654: skandhāśriteyaṃ śibikā mama bhāro 'tra kiṃ kṛtaḥ // ViP_2,13.63 //
GP12vipce_pu:4656: tatra tvam aham apy atra procyate cedam anyathā // ViP_2,13.64 //
GP12vipce_pu:4657: ahaṃ tvaṃ ca tathānye ca bhūtair uhyāma pārthiva /
GP12vipce_pu:4659: karmavaśyā guṇā hy ete sattvādyāḥ pṛthivīpate /
GP12vipce_pu:4660: avidyāsaṃcitaṃ karma tac cāśeṣeṣu jantuṣu // ViP_2,13.66 //
GP12vipce_pu:4661: ātmā śuddho 'kṣaraḥ śānto nirguṇaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4663: yadā nopacayas tasya na caivāpacayo nṛpa /
GP12vipce_pu:4664: tadā pīvān asītītthaṃ kayā yuktyā tvayeritam // ViP_2,13.68 //
GP12vipce_pu:4666: śibikeyaṃ yadā skandhe tadā bhāraḥ samas tvayā // ViP_2,13.69 //
GP12vipce_pu:4667: tathānyair jantubhir bhūpa śibikottho na kevalam /
GP12vipce_pu:4669: yadā puṃsaḥ pṛthagbhāvaḥ prākṛtaiḥ kāraṇair nṛpa /
GP12vipce_pu:4670: voḍhavyas tu tadā bhāraḥ katamo nṛpate mayā // ViP_2,13.71 //
GP12vipce_pu:4674: evam uktvābhavan maunī sa vahañ chibikāṃ dvijaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4675: so 'pi rājāvatīryorvyāṃ tatpādau jagṛhe tvaran // ViP_2,13.73 //
GP12vipce_pu:4677: bho bho visṛjya śibikāṃ prasādaṃ kuru me dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:4678: kathyatāṃ ko bhavān atra jālmarūpadharaḥ sthitaḥ // ViP_2,13.74 //
GP12vipce_pu:4679: yo bhavān yan nimittaṃ vā yad āgamanakāraṇam /
GP12vipce_pu:4680: tat sarvaṃ kathyatāṃ vidvan mahyaṃ śuśrūṣave tvayā // ViP_2,13.75 //
GP12vipce_pu:4682: śrūyatāṃ ko 'ham ity etad vaktuṃ bhūpa na śakyate /
GP12vipce_pu:4685: dharmādharmodbhavau bhoktuṃ jantur dehādim ṛcchati // ViP_2,13.77 //
GP12vipce_pu:4686: sarvasyaiva hi bhūpāla jantoḥ sarvatra kāraṇam /
GP12vipce_pu:4687: dharmādharmau yatas tasmāt kāraṇaṃ pṛcchyate kutaḥ // ViP_2,13.78 //
GP12vipce_pu:4691: yat tv etad bhavatā proktaṃ ko 'ham ity etad ātmanaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4692: vaktuṃ na śakyate śrotuṃ tan mamecchā pravartate // ViP_2,13.80 //
GP12vipce_pu:4693: yo 'sti so 'ham iti brahman kathaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyate /
GP12vipce_pu:4694: ātmany eva na doṣāya śabdo 'ham iti yo dvija // ViP_2,13.81 //
GP12vipce_pu:4696: śabdo 'ham iti doṣāya nātmany eṣa tathaiva tat /
GP12vipce_pu:4697: anātmany ātmavijñānaṃ śabdo vā bhrāntilakṣaṇaḥ // ViP_2,13.82 //
GP12vipce_pu:4698: jihvā bravīty aham iti dantauṣṭhau tālukaṃ nṛpa /
GP12vipce_pu:4699: ete nāhaṃ yataḥ sarve vāṅniṣpādanahetavaḥ // ViP_2,13.83 //
GP12vipce_pu:4700: kiṃ hetubhir vadaty eṣā vāg evāham iti svayam /
GP12vipce_pu:4701: tathāpi vāṅ nāham etad vaktum itthaṃ na yujyate // ViP_2,13.84 //
GP12vipce_pu:4703: tato 'ham iti kutraitāṃ saṃjñāṃ rājan karomy aham // ViP_2,13.85 //
GP12vipce_pu:4704: yady anyo 'sti paraḥ ko 'pi mattaḥ pārthivasattama /
GP12vipce_pu:4705: tadaiṣo 'ham ayaṃ cānyo vaktum evam apīṣyate // ViP_2,13.86 //
GP12vipce_pu:4707: tadā hi ko bhavān ko 'ham ity etad viphalaṃ vacaḥ // ViP_2,13.87 //
GP12vipce_pu:4708: tvaṃ rājā śibikā ceyam vayaṃ vāhāḥ puraḥsarāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4709: ayaṃ ca bhavato loko na sad etan nṛpocyate // ViP_2,13.88 //
GP12vipce_pu:4710: vṛkṣād dāru tataś ceyaṃ śibikā tvadadhiṣṭhitā /
GP12vipce_pu:4711: kva vṛkṣasaṃjñā yātā syād dārusaṃjñātha vā nṛpa // ViP_2,13.89 //
GP12vipce_pu:4712: vṛkṣārūḍho mahārājo nāyaṃ vadati te janaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4713: na ca dāruṇi sarvas tvāṃ bravīti śibikāgatam // ViP_2,13.90 //
GP12vipce_pu:4715: anviṣyatāṃ nṛpaśreṣṭha tadbhede śibikā tvayā // ViP_2,13.91 //
GP12vipce_pu:4717: kva yātaṃ chatram ity eṣa nyāyas tvayi tathā mayi // ViP_2,13.92 //
GP12vipce_pu:4718: pumān strī gaur ayaṃ vājī kuñjaro vihagas taruḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4720: pumān na devo na naro na paśur na ca pādapaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4722: vastu rājeti yal loke yac ca rājabhaṭātmakam /
GP12vipce_pu:4723: tathānyac ca nṛpetthaṃ tan na satsaṃkalpanāmayam // ViP_2,13.95 //
GP12vipce_pu:4724: yat tu kālāntareṇāpi nānyasaṃjñām upaiti vai /
GP12vipce_pu:4725: pariṇāmādisaṃbhūtaṃ tad vastu nṛpa tac ca kim // ViP_2,13.96 //
GP12vipce_pu:4726: tvaṃ rājā sarvalokasya pituḥ putro ripo ripuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4727: patnyāḥ patiḥ pitā sūnoḥ kaṃ tvāṃ bhūpa vadāmy aham // ViP_2,13.97 //
GP12vipce_pu:4728: tvaṃ kim etac chiraḥ kiṃ nu śiras tava tathodaram /
GP12vipce_pu:4729: kim u pādādikaṃ tvaṃ vai tavaitat kiṃ mahīpate // ViP_2,13.98 //
GP12vipce_pu:4731: ko 'ham ity eva nipuṇo bhūtvā cintaya pārthiva // ViP_2,13.99 //
GP12vipce_pu:4732: evaṃ vyavasthite tattve mayāham iti bhāṣitum /
GP12vipce_pu:4737: praśrayāvanato bhūtvā tam āha nṛpatir dvijam // ViP_2,14.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:4742: bhagavan yat tvayā proktaṃ paramārthamayaṃ vacaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4743: śrute tasmin bhramantīva manaso mama vṛttayaḥ // ViP_2,14.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:4745: bhavatā darśitaṃ vipra tat paraṃ prakṛter mahat // ViP_2,14.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:4746: nāhaṃ vahāmi śibikāṃ śibikā na mayi sthitā /
GP12vipce_pu:4747: śarīram anyad asmatto yeneyaṃ śibikā dhṛtā // ViP_2,14.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:4749: pravartante guṇāś caite kiṃ mameti tvayoditam // ViP_2,14.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:4751: mano vihvalatām eti paramārthārthitāṃ gatam // ViP_2,14.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:4752: pūrvam eva mahābhāgaṃ kapilarṣim ahaṃ dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:4753: praṣṭum abhyudyato gatvā śreyaḥ kiṃ nv ity asaṃśayam // ViP_2,14.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:4754: tadantare ca bhavatā yad idaṃ vākyam īritam /
GP12vipce_pu:4755: tenaiva paramārthārthaṃ tvayi cetaḥ pradhāvati // ViP_2,14.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:4758: sa eva bhagavān nūnam asmākaṃ hitakāmyayā /
GP12vipce_pu:4759: pratyakṣatām atra gato yathaitad bhavatocyate // ViP_2,14.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:4760: tan mahyaṃ praṇatāya tvaṃ yac chreyaḥ paramaṃ dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:4763: bhūpa pṛcchasi kiṃ śreyaḥ paramārthaṃ nu pṛcchasi /
GP12vipce_pu:4764: śreyāṃsy aparamārthāni aśeṣāṇy eva bhūpate // ViP_2,14.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:4766: putrān icchati rājyaṃ ca śreyas tatprāptilakṣaṇam // ViP_2,14.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:4768: śreyaḥ pradhānaṃ ca phale tad evānabhisaṃhite // ViP_2,14.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:4769: ātmā dhyeyaḥ sadā bhūpa yogayuktais tathā param /
GP12vipce_pu:4770: śreyas tasyaiva saṃyogaḥ śreyo yaḥ paramātmanaḥ // ViP_2,14.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:4772: santy atra paramārthās tu na tv ete śrūyatāṃ ca me // ViP_2,14.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:4773: dharmāya tyajyate kiṃ tu paramārtho dhanaṃ yadi /
GP12vipce_pu:4774: vyayaś ca kriyate kasmāt kāmaprāptyupalakṣaṇaḥ // ViP_2,14.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:4775: putraś cet paramārthākhyaḥ so 'py anyasya nareśvara /
GP12vipce_pu:4776: paramārthabhūtaḥ so 'nyasya paramārtho hi tatpitā // ViP_2,14.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:4777: evaṃ na paramārtho 'sti jagaty asmiṃś carācare /
GP12vipce_pu:4778: paramārtho hi kāryāṇi kāraṇānām aśeṣataḥ // ViP_2,14.19 //
GP12vipce_pu:4780: paramārthā bhavanty atra na bhavanti ca vai tataḥ // ViP_2,14.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:4782: paramārthabhūtaṃ tatrāpi śrūyatāṃ gadato mama // ViP_2,14.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:4783: yat tu niṣpādyate kāryaṃ mṛdā kāraṇabhūtayā /
GP12vipce_pu:4784: tat kāraṇānugamanāj jñāyate nṛpa mṛṇmayam // ViP_2,14.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:4786: niṣpādyate kriyā yā tu sā bhavitrī vināśinī // ViP_2,14.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:4788: tat tu nāśi na saṃdeho nāśidravyopapāditam // ViP_2,14.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:4789: tad evāphaladaṃ karma paramārtho matas tava /
GP12vipce_pu:4792: bhedakāri parebhyas tat paramārtho na bhedavān // ViP_2,14.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:4794: mithyaitad anyadravyaṃ hi naiti taddravyatāṃ yataḥ // ViP_2,14.27 //
GP12vipce_pu:4795: tasmāc chreyāṃsy aśeṣāṇi nṛpaitāni na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4796: paramārthas tu bhūpāla saṃkṣepāc chrūyatāṃ mama // ViP_2,14.28 //
GP12vipce_pu:4797: eko vyāpī samaḥ śuddho nirguṇaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4800: na yogavān na yukto 'bhūn naiva pārthiva yokṣyati // ViP_2,14.30 //
GP12vipce_pu:4804: abhedavyāpino vāyos tathā tasya mahātmanaḥ // ViP_2,14.32 //
GP12vipce_pu:4806: devādibhede 'padhvaste nāsty evāvaraṇo hi saḥ // ViP_2,14.33 //
GP12vipce_pu:4809: ity ukte mauninaṃ bhūyaś cintayānaṃ mahīpatim /
GP12vipce_pu:4812: śrūyatāṃ nṛpaśārdūla yad gītam ṛbhuṇā purā /
GP12vipce_pu:4817: pramāṇatarkataḥ samyak māne meye 'pi niścite // ViP_2,15.3*14 //
GP12vipce_pu:4819: prādād aśeṣavijñānaṃ sa tasmai parayā mudā // ViP_2,15.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:4821: sa ṛbhus tarkayām āsa nidāghasya nareśvara // ViP_2,15.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:4822: devikāyās taṭe vīranagaraṃ nāma vai puram /
GP12vipce_pu:4823: samṛddham atiramyaṃ ca pulastyena niveśitam // ViP_2,15.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:4825: nidāgho nāma yogajña ṛbhuśiṣyo 'vasat purā // ViP_2,15.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:4826: divye varṣasahasre tu samatīte 'sya tat puram /
GP12vipce_pu:4827: jagāma sa ṛbhuḥ śiṣyaṃ nidāgham avalokitum // ViP_2,15.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:4831: uvāca sa dvijaśreṣṭho bhujyatām iti sādaram // ViP_2,15.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:4833: bho vipravarya bhoktavyaṃ yad annaṃ bhavato gṛhe /
GP12vipce_pu:4834: tat kathyatāṃ kadanneṣu na prītiḥ satataṃ mama // ViP_2,15.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:4837: yad rocate dvijaśreṣṭha tat tvaṃ bhuṅkṣva yathecchayā // ViP_2,15.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:4839: kadannāni dvijaitāni miṣṭam annaṃ prayaccha me /
GP12vipce_pu:4842: he he śālini madgehe yat kiṃcid atiśobhanam /
GP12vipce_pu:4845: ity uktā tena sā patnī miṣṭam annaṃ dvijasya yat /
GP12vipce_pu:4846: prasādhitavatī tad vai bhartur vacanagauravāt // ViP_2,15.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:4847: taṃ bhuktavantam icchāto miṣṭam annaṃ mahāmunim /
GP12vipce_pu:4848: nidāghaḥ prāha bhūpāla praśrayāvanataḥ sthitaḥ // ViP_2,15.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:4850: api te paramā tṛptir utpannā tuṣṭir eva ca /
GP12vipce_pu:4851: api te mānasaṃ svastham āhāreṇa kṛtaṃ dvija // ViP_2,15.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:4852: kvanivāso bhavān vipra kva ca gantuṃ samudyataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4853: āgamyate ca bhavatā yatas tac ca dvijocyatām // ViP_2,15.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:4855: kṣud yasya tasya bhukte 'nne tṛptir brāhmaṇa jāyate /
GP12vipce_pu:4856: na me kṣud abhavat tṛptiṃ kasmān māṃ paripṛcchasi // ViP_2,15.19 //
GP12vipce_pu:4858: bhavaty ambhasi ca kṣīṇe nṛṇāṃ tṛḍ api jāyate // ViP_2,15.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:4859: kṣuttṛṣṇe dehadharmākhye na mamaite yato dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:4860: tataḥ kṣutsaṃbhavābhāvāt tṛptir asty eva me sadā // ViP_2,15.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:4861: manasaḥ svasthatā tuṣṭiś cittadharmāv imau dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:4862: cetaso yasya tat pṛccha pumān ebhir na yujyate // ViP_2,15.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:4863: kva nivāsas tavety uktaṃ kva gantāsi ca yat tvayā /
GP12vipce_pu:4864: kutaś cāgamyate tatra tritaye 'pi nibodha me // ViP_2,15.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:4865: pumān sarvagato vyāpī ākāśavad ayaṃ yataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4866: kutaḥ kutra kva gantāsīty etad apy arthavat katham // ViP_2,15.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:4868: tvaṃ cānye ca na ca tvaṃ ca nānye naivāham apy aham // ViP_2,15.25 //
GP12vipce_pu:4869: mṛṣṭaṃ na mṛṣṭam ity eṣā jijñāsā me kṛtā tava /
GP12vipce_pu:4870: kiṃ vakṣyatīti tatrāpi śrūyatāṃ dvijasattama // ViP_2,15.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:4871: kim asvādv atha vā mṛṣṭaṃ bhuñjato 'nnaṃ dvijottama /
GP12vipce_pu:4872: mṛṣṭam eva yadāmṛṣṭaṃ tad evodvegakāraṇam // ViP_2,15.27 //
GP12vipce_pu:4873: amṛṣṭaṃ jāyate mṛṣṭaṃ mṛṣṭād udvijate janaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4875: mṛṇmayaṃ hi gṛhaṃ yadvan mṛdā liptaṃ sthiraṃ bhavet /
GP12vipce_pu:4876: pārthivo 'yaṃ tathā dehaḥ pārthivaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ // ViP_2,15.29 //
GP12vipce_pu:4878: ālipta āpyāyayataḥ puṃso bhogo 'tra kiṃ kṛtaḥ // ViP_2,15.29*15 //
GP12vipce_pu:4880: guḍaṃ phalādīni tathā pārthivāḥ paramāṇavaḥ // ViP_2,15.30 //
GP12vipce_pu:4881: tad etad bhavatā jñātvā mṛṣṭāmṛṣṭavicāri yat /
GP12vipce_pu:4882: tan manaḥ samatālambi kāryaṃ sāmyaṃ hi muktaye // ViP_2,15.31 //
GP12vipce_pu:4884: ity ākarṇya vacas tasya paramārthāśritaṃ nṛpa /
GP12vipce_pu:4885: praṇipatya mahābhāgo nidāgho vākyam abravīt // ViP_2,15.32 //
GP12vipce_pu:4886: prasīda maddhitārthāya kathyatāṃ yas tvam āgataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4887: naṣṭo mohas tavākarṇya vacāṃsy etāni me dvija // ViP_2,15.33 //
GP12vipce_pu:4889: ṛbhur asmi tavācāryaḥ prajñādānāya te dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:4891: evam ekam idaṃ viddhi na bhedi sakalaṃ jagat /
GP12vipce_pu:4895: pūjitaḥ parayā bhaktyā icchātaḥ prayayāv ṛbhuḥ // ViP_2,15.36 //
GP12vipce_pu:4899: nidāghajñānadānāya tad eva nagaraṃ yayau // ViP_2,16.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:4900: nagarasya bahiḥ so 'tha nidāghaṃ dadṛśe muniḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4904: dṛṣṭvā nidāghaṃ sa ṛbhur upagamyābhivādya ca /
GP12vipce_pu:4905: uvāca kasmād ekānte sthīyate bhavatā dvija // ViP_2,16.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:4907: bho vipra janasaṃmardo mahān eṣa nareśvare /
GP12vipce_pu:4908: pravivikṣau puraṃ ramyaṃ tenātra sthīyate mayā // ViP_2,16.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:4911: kathyatāṃ me dvijaśreṣṭha tvam abhijño mato mama // ViP_2,16.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:4916: etau hi gajarājānau yugapad darśitau mama /
GP12vipce_pu:4919: jñātum icchāmy ahaṃ ko 'tra gajaḥ ko vā narādhipaḥ // ViP_2,16.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:4921: gajo yo 'yam adho brahmann upary asyaiva bhūpatiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4922: vāhyavāhakasaṃbandhaṃ ko na jānāti vai dvija // ViP_2,16.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:4924: jānāmy ahaṃ yathā brahmaṃs tathā mām avabodhaya /
GP12vipce_pu:4925: adhaḥśabdanigadyaṃ kiṃ kiṃ cordhvam abhidhīyate // ViP_2,16.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:4927: ity uktaḥ sahasāruhya nidāghaḥ prāha tam ṛbhum /
GP12vipce_pu:4928: śrūyatāṃ kathayāmy eṣa yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi // ViP_2,16.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:4929: upary ahaṃ yathā rājā tvam adhaḥ kuñjaro yathā /
GP12vipce_pu:4930: avabodhāya te brahman dṛṣṭānto darśito mayā // ViP_2,16.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:4932: tvaṃ rājeva dvijaśreṣṭha sthito 'haṃ gajavad yadi /
GP12vipce_pu:4933: tad eva tvaṃ mamācakṣva katamas tvam ahaṃ tathā // ViP_2,16.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:4935: ity uktaḥ satvaras tasya pragṛhya caraṇāv ubhau /
GP12vipce_pu:4936: nidāghaḥ prāha bhagavān ācāryas tvam ṛbhur dhruvam // ViP_2,16.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:4938: yathācāryasya tena tvāṃ manye prāptam ahaṃ gurum // ViP_2,16.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:4941: gurus te 'ham ṛbhur nāmnā nidāgha samupāgataḥ // ViP_2,16.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:4942: tad etad upadiṣṭaṃ te saṃkṣepeṇa mahāmate /
GP12vipce_pu:4945: evam uktvā yayau vidvān nidāghaṃ sa ṛbhur guruḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4948: tathā brahma tato muktim avāpa paramāṃ dvijaḥ // ViP_2,16.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:4950: bhava sarvagataṃ jānann ātmānam avanīpate // ViP_2,16.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:4952: bhrāntadṛṣṭibhir ātmāpi tathaikaḥ san pṛthak pṛthak // ViP_2,16.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:4953: ekaḥ samastaṃ yad ihāsti kiṃcit tad acyuto vāsti paraṃ tato 'nyat /
GP12vipce_pu:4954: so 'haṃ sa ca tvaṃ sa ca sarvam etad ātmasvarūpaṃ tyaja bhedamoham // ViP_2,16.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:4956: itīritas tena sa rājavaryas tatyāja bhedaṃ paramārthadṛṣṭiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4957: sa cāpi jātismaraṇāptabodhas tatraiva janmany apavargam āpa // ViP_2,16.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:4958: iti bharatanarendrasāravṛttaṃ kathayati yaś ca śṛṇoti bhaktiyuktaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4959: sa vimalamatir eti nātmamohaṃ bhavati ca saṃsaraṇeṣu muktiyogyaḥ // ViP_2,16.25 //
GP12vipce_pu:4963: sūryādīnāṃ ca saṃsthānaṃ jyotiṣām api vistarāt // ViP_3,1.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:4964: devādīnāṃ tathā sṛṣṭir ṛṣīṇāṃ cāpi varṇitā /
GP12vipce_pu:4967: manvantarāṇy aśeṣāṇi śrotum icchāmy anukramāt // ViP_3,1.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:4969: bhavatā kathitān etāñ śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ guro // ViP_3,1.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:4972: tāny ahaṃ bhavate samyak kathayāmi yathākramam // ViP_3,1.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:4973: svāyaṃbhuvo manuḥ pūrvaṃ manuḥ svārociṣas tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:4974: uttamas tāmasaś caiva raivataś cākṣuṣas tathā // ViP_3,1.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:4975: ṣaḍ ete manavo 'tītāḥ sāmprataṃ tu raveḥ sutaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4977: svāyaṃbhuvaṃ tu kathitaṃ kalpādāv antaraṃ mayā /
GP12vipce_pu:4978: devās tatrarṣayaś caiva yathāvat kathitā mayā // ViP_3,1.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:4979: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi manoḥ svārociṣasya tu /
GP12vipce_pu:4980: manvantarādhipān samyag devarṣīṃs tatsutāṃs tathā // ViP_3,1.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:4982: vipaścit tatra devendro maitreyāsīn mahābalaḥ // ViP_3,1.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:4983: ūrjaḥ stambhas tathā prāṇo dattolir ṛṣabhas tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:4984: niścaraś cārvarīvāṃś ca tatra saptarṣayo 'bhavan // ViP_3,1.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:4986: dvitīyam etat kathitam antaraṃ śṛṇu cottaram // ViP_3,1.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:4987: tṛtīye 'py antare brahmann uttamo nāma yo manuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4988: suśāntir nāma devendro maitreyābhūt sureśvaraḥ // ViP_3,1.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:4989: sudhāmānas tathā satyāḥ śivāś cāsan pratardanāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4990: vaśavartinaś ca pañcaite gaṇā dvādaśakāḥ smṛtāḥ // ViP_3,1.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:4994: satyāś ca sudhiyaś caiva saptaviṃśatikā gaṇāḥ // ViP_3,1.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:4996: saptarṣayaś ca ye teṣāṃ tatra nāmāni me śṛṇu // ViP_3,1.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:4997: jyotirdhāmā pṛthuḥ kāvyaś caitro 'gnir vanakas tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:4998: pīvaraś carṣayo hy ete sapta tatrāpi cāntare // ViP_3,1.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:5000: putrās tu tāmasasyāsan rājānaḥ sumahābalāḥ // ViP_3,1.19 //
GP12vipce_pu:5001: pañcame cāpi maitreya raivato nāma nāmataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5002: manur vibhuś ca tatrendro devāṃś caivāntare śṛṇu // ViP_3,1.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:5004: ete devagaṇās tatra caturdaśa caturdaśa // ViP_3,1.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:5006: vedabāhuḥ sudhāmā ca parjanyaś ca mahāmuniḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5007: ete saptarṣayo vipra tatrāsan raivate 'ntare // ViP_3,1.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:5010: svārociṣaś cottamaś ca tāmaso raivatas tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:5011: priyavratānvayā hy ete catvāro manavaḥ smṛtāḥ // ViP_3,1.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:5012: viṣṇum ārādhya tapasā sa rājarṣiḥ priyavrataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5014: ṣaṣṭhe manvantare cāsīc cākṣuṣākhyas tathā manuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5015: manojavas tathaivendro devān api nibodha me // ViP_3,1.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:5016: āpyāḥ prasūtā bhavyāś ca pṛthugāś ca divaukasaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5017: mahānubhāvā lekhāś ca pañcaite hy aṣṭakā gaṇāḥ // ViP_3,1.27 //
GP12vipce_pu:5018: sumedhā virajāś caiva haviṣmān uttamo madhuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5019: atināmā sahiṣṇuś ca saptāsann iti carṣayaḥ // ViP_3,1.28 //
GP12vipce_pu:5023: manuḥ saṃvartate dhīmān sāmprataṃ saptame 'ntare // ViP_3,1.30 //
GP12vipce_pu:5028: ikṣvākuś ca nṛgaś caiva dhṛṣṭaḥ śaryātir eva ca /
GP12vipce_pu:5029: nariṣyantaś ca vikhyāto nābhāgo diṣṭa eva ca // ViP_3,1.33 //
GP12vipce_pu:5030: karūṣaś ca pṛṣadhraś ca vasumāṃl lokaviśrutaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5031: manor vaivasvatasyaite nava putrāḥ sudhārmikāḥ // ViP_3,1.34 //
GP12vipce_pu:5035: ākūtyāṃ mānaso deva utpannaḥ prathame 'ntare // ViP_3,1.36 //
GP12vipce_pu:5036: tataḥ punaḥ sa vai devaḥ prāpte svārociṣe 'ntare /
GP12vipce_pu:5037: tuṣitāyāṃ samutpanno hy ajitas tuṣitaiḥ saha // ViP_3,1.37 //
GP12vipce_pu:5038: auttame hy antare cāpi tuṣitas tu punaḥ sa vai /
GP12vipce_pu:5039: satyāyām abhavat satyaḥ satyaiḥ saha surottamaiḥ // ViP_3,1.38 //
GP12vipce_pu:5040: tāmasasyāntare caiva saṃprāpte punar eva hi /
GP12vipce_pu:5041: haryāyāṃ haribhiḥ sārdhaṃ harir eva babhūva ha // ViP_3,1.39 //
GP12vipce_pu:5043: saṃbhūto rājasaiḥ sārdhaṃ devair devavaro hariḥ // ViP_3,1.40 //
GP12vipce_pu:5045: vikuṇṭhāyām asau jajñe vaikuṇṭhair daivataiḥ saha // ViP_3,1.41 //
GP12vipce_pu:5046: manvantare tu saṃprāpte tathā vaivasvate dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:5047: vāmanaḥ kaśyapād viṣṇur adityāṃ saṃbabhūva ha // ViP_3,1.42 //
GP12vipce_pu:5048: tribhiḥ kramair imāṃl lokāñ jitvā yena mahātmanā /
GP12vipce_pu:5050: ity etās tanavas tasya sapta manvantareṣu vai /
GP12vipce_pu:5051: saptasv evābhavan vipra yābhiḥ saṃrakṣitāḥ prajāḥ // ViP_3,1.44 //
GP12vipce_pu:5052: yasmād viṣṭam idaṃ sarvaṃ tasya śaktyā mahātmanaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5053: tasmāt sa procyate viṣṇur viśer dhātoḥ praveśanāt // ViP_3,1.45 //
GP12vipce_pu:5054: sarve ca devā manavaḥ samastāḥ saptarṣayo ye manusūnavaś ca /
GP12vipce_pu:5055: indraś ca yo yas tridaśeśabhūto viṣṇor aśeṣās tu vibhūtayas tāḥ // ViP_3,1.46 //
GP12vipce_pu:5058: proktāny etāni bhavatā sapta manvantarāṇi vai /
GP12vipce_pu:5059: bhaviṣyāṇy api viprarṣe mamākhyātuṃ tvam arhasi // ViP_3,2.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:5062: manur yamo yamī caiva tadapatyāni vai mune // ViP_3,2.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:5063: asahantī tu sā bhartus tejaś chāyāṃ yuyoja vai /
GP12vipce_pu:5064: bhartuḥ śuśrūṣaṇe 'raṇyaṃ svayaṃ ca tapase yayau // ViP_3,2.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:5065: saṃjñeyam ity athārkaś ca chāyāyām ātmajatrayam /
GP12vipce_pu:5066: śanaiścaraṃ manuṃ cānyaṃ tapatīṃ cāpy ajījanat // ViP_3,2.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:5067: chāyāsaṃjñā dadau śāpaṃ yamāya kupitā yadā /
GP12vipce_pu:5068: tadānyeyam asau buddhir ity āsīd yamasūryayoḥ // ViP_3,2.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:5070: samādhidṛṣṭyā dadṛśe tām aśvāṃ tapasi sthitām // ViP_3,2.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:5072: janayām āsa revantaṃ retaso 'nte ca bhāskaraḥ // ViP_3,2.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:5073: āninye ca punaḥ saṃjñāṃ svasthānaṃ bhagavān raviḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5074: tejasaḥ śamanaṃ cāsya viśvakarmā cakāra ha // ViP_3,2.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:5075: bhramam āropya sūryaṃ tu tasya tejoviśātanam /
GP12vipce_pu:5076: kṛtavān aṣṭamaṃ bhāgaṃ na vyaśātayatāvyayam // ViP_3,2.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:5077: yat sūryād vaiṣṇavaṃ tejaḥ śātitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā /
GP12vipce_pu:5078: jājvalyamānam apatat tad bhūmau munisattama // ViP_3,2.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:5079: tvaṣṭaiva tejasā tena viṣṇoś cakram akalpayat /
GP12vipce_pu:5080: triśūlaṃ caiva śarvasya śibikāṃ dhanadasya ca // ViP_3,2.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:5081: śaktiṃ guhasya devānām anyeṣāṃ ca yad āyudham /
GP12vipce_pu:5082: tat sarvaṃ tejasā tena viśvakarmā vyavardhayat // ViP_3,2.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:5084: pūrvajasya savarṇo 'sau sāvarṇis tena kathyate // ViP_3,2.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:5085: tasya manvantaraṃ hy etat sāvarṇikam athāṣṭamam /
GP12vipce_pu:5086: tac chṛṇuṣva mahābhāga bhaviṣyaṃ kathayāmi te // ViP_3,2.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:5087: sāvarṇis tu manur yo 'sau maitreya bhavitā tataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5088: sutapāś cāmitābhāś ca mukhyāś cāpi tadā surāḥ // ViP_3,2.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:5089: teṣāṃ gaṇas tu devānām ekaiko viṃśakaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5090: saptarṣīn api vakṣyāmi bhaviṣyān munisattama // ViP_3,2.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:5091: dīptimān gālavo rāmaḥ kṛpo drauṇis tathāparaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5092: matputraś ca tathā vyāsa ṛśyaśṛṅgaś ca saptamaḥ // ViP_3,2.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:5094: virocanasutas teṣāṃ balir indro bhaviṣyati // ViP_3,2.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:5096: sāvarṇes tu manoḥ putrā bhaviṣyanti nareśvarāḥ // ViP_3,2.19 //
GP12vipce_pu:5097: navamo dakṣasāvarṇir maitreya bhavitā manuḥ // ViP_3,2.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:5098: pārā marīcigarbhāś ca sudharmāṇas tathā tridhā /
GP12vipce_pu:5099: bhaviṣyanti tadā devā ekaiko dvādaśo gaṇaḥ // ViP_3,2.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:5100: teṣām indro mahāvīryo bhaviṣyaty adbhuto dvija // ViP_3,2.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:5101: savano dyutimān bhavyo vasur medhātithis tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:5102: jyotiṣmān saptamaḥ satyas tatraite ca maharṣayaḥ // ViP_3,2.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:5106: sudhāmāno viruddhāś ca śatasaṃkhyās tathā surāḥ // ViP_3,2.25 //
GP12vipce_pu:5107: teṣām indraś ca bhavitā śāntir nāma mahābalaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5108: saptarṣayo bhaviṣyanti ye tadā tāñ chṛṇuṣva ca // ViP_3,2.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:5109: haviṣmān sukṛtiḥ satyo hy apāṃmūrtis tathāparaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5110: nābhāgo 'pratimaujāś ca satyaketus tathaiva ca // ViP_3,2.27 //
GP12vipce_pu:5113: ekādaśaś ca bhavitā dharmasāvarṇiko manuḥ // ViP_3,2.29 //
GP12vipce_pu:5115: gaṇās tv ete tadā mukhyā devānāṃ ca bhaviṣyatām /
GP12vipce_pu:5116: ekaikas triṃśakas teṣāṃ gaṇaś cendraś ca vai vṛṣaḥ // ViP_3,2.30 //
GP12vipce_pu:5117: niścaraś cāgnitejāś ca vapuṣmān viṣṇur āruṇiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5118: haviṣmān anaghaś caite bhavyāḥ saptarṣayas tathā // ViP_3,2.31 //
GP12vipce_pu:5120: bhaviṣyanti manos tasya tanayāḥ pṛthivīśvarāḥ // ViP_3,2.32 //
GP12vipce_pu:5121: rudraputras tu sāvarṇir bhavitā dvādaśo manuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5122: ṛtadhāmā ca tatrendro bhavitā śṛṇu me surān // ViP_3,2.33 //
GP12vipce_pu:5123: haritā lohitā devās tathā sumanaso dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:5124: sukarmāṇaḥ supārāś ca daśakāḥ pañca vai gaṇāḥ // ViP_3,2.34 //
GP12vipce_pu:5126: tapodhṛtir dyutiś cānyaḥ saptamas tu tapodhanaḥ // ViP_3,2.35 //
GP12vipce_pu:5128: manos tasya mahāvīryā bhaviṣyanti sutā nṛpāḥ // ViP_3,2.36 //
GP12vipce_pu:5129: trayodaśo raucyanāmā bhaviṣyati mune manuḥ // ViP_3,2.37 //
GP12vipce_pu:5131: trayas triṃśadvibhedās te devānāṃ ye tu vai gaṇāḥ // ViP_3,2.38 //
GP12vipce_pu:5132: divaspatir mahāvīryas teṣām indro bhaviṣyati // ViP_3,2.39 //
GP12vipce_pu:5134: dhṛtimān avyayaś cānyaḥ saptamaḥ sutapā muniḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5135: saptarṣayas tv ime tasya putrān api nibodha me // ViP_3,2.40 //
GP12vipce_pu:5137: bhautyaś caturdaśaś cātra maitreya bhavitā manuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5138: śucir indraḥ suragaṇās tatra pañca śṛṇuṣva tān // ViP_3,2.42 //
GP12vipce_pu:5139: cākṣuṣāś ca pavitrāś ca kaniṣṭhā bhrājirās tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:5140: vācāvṛddhāś ca vai devāḥ saptarṣīn api me śṛṇu // ViP_3,2.43 //
GP12vipce_pu:5141: agnibāhuḥ śuciḥ śukro māgadho 'gnīdhra eva ca /
GP12vipce_pu:5142: yuktas tathā jitaś cānyo manuputrān ataḥ śṛṇu // ViP_3,2.44 //
GP12vipce_pu:5144: kathitā muniśārdūla pālayiṣyanti ye mahīm // ViP_3,2.45 //
GP12vipce_pu:5146: pravartayanti tān etya bhuvi saptarṣayo divaḥ // ViP_3,2.46 //
GP12vipce_pu:5147: kṛte kṛte smṛter vipra praṇetā jāyate manuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5148: devā yajñabhujas te tu yāvan manvantaraṃ tu tat // ViP_3,2.47 //
GP12vipce_pu:5149: bhavanti ye manoḥ putrā yāvan manvantaraṃ tu taiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5150: tadanvayodbhavaiś caiva tāvad bhūḥ paripālyate // ViP_3,2.48 //
GP12vipce_pu:5151: manuḥ saptarṣayo devā bhūpālāś ca manoḥ sutāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5152: manvantare bhavanty ete śakraś caivādhikāriṇaḥ // ViP_3,2.49 //
GP12vipce_pu:5153: caturdaśabhir etais tu gatair manvantarair dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:5155: tāvatpramāṇā ca niśā tato bhavati sattama /
GP12vipce_pu:5157: trailokyam akhilaṃ grastvā bhagavān ādikṛd vibhuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5159: tataḥ prabuddho bhagavān yathā pūrvaṃ tathā punaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5160: sṛṣṭiṃ karoty avyayātmā kalpe kalpe rajoguṇaḥ // ViP_3,2.53 //
GP12vipce_pu:5161: manavo bhūbhujaḥ sendrā devāḥ saptarṣayas tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:5164: yugavyavasthāṃ kurute yathā maitreya tac chṛṇu // ViP_3,2.55 //
GP12vipce_pu:5168: duṣṭānāṃ nigrahaṃ kurvan paripāti jagattrayam // ViP_3,2.57 //
GP12vipce_pu:5169: vedam ekaṃ caturbhedaṃ kṛtvā śākhāśatair vibhuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5171: vedāṃs tu dvāpare vyasya kaler ante punar hariḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5172: kalkisvarūpī durvṛttān mārge sthāpayati prabhuḥ // ViP_3,2.59 //
GP12vipce_pu:5173: evam eṣa jagat sarvaṃ paripāti karoti ca /
GP12vipce_pu:5174: hanti cānteṣv anantātmā nāsty asmād vyatireki yat // ViP_3,2.60 //
GP12vipce_pu:5175: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca sarvabhūtān mahātmanaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5176: tad atrānyatra vā vipra sadbhāvaḥ kathitas tava // ViP_3,2.61 //
GP12vipce_pu:5178: manvantarādhipāṃś caiva kim anyat kathayāmi te // ViP_3,2.62 //
GP12vipce_pu:5181: jñātam etan mayā tvatto yathā sarvam idaṃ jagat /
GP12vipce_pu:5182: viṣṇur viṣṇau viṣṇutaś ca na paraṃ vidyate tataḥ // ViP_3,3.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:5183: etat tu śrotum icchāmi vyastā vedā mahātmanā /

GP12vipce_pu:6844: ativibhūter bhūribalaparākramaḥ karaṃdhamaḥ putro 'bhavat tasmād apy avikṣir avikṣer apy atibalaḥ putro marutto 'bhavad yasyemāv adyāpi ślokau gīyete // ViP_4,1.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:6845: maruttasya yathā yajñas tathā kasyābhavad bhuvi /

GP12vipce_pu:6848: marutaḥ pariveṣṭāraḥ sadasyāś ca divaukasaḥ // ViP_4,1.28 //

GP12vipce_pu:6859: somadattaḥ kṛśāśvāj jajñe yo daśāśvamedhān ājahāra // ViP_4,1.38 //

GP12vipce_pu:6869: revatasyāpi raivataḥ putraḥ kakudmī nāma dharmātmā bhrātṛśatasya jyeṣṭho 'bhavat // ViP_4,1.44 //
GP12vipce_pu:6871: tām ādāya kasyeyam arhatīti bhagavantam abjayoniṃ praṣṭuṃ brahmalokaṃ jagāma // ViP_4,1.45 //
GP12vipce_pu:6872: tāvac ca brahmaṇo 'ntike hāhāhūhūsaṃjñābhyāṃ gandharvābhyām atitānaṃ nāma divyaṃ gāndharvam agīyata // ViP_4,1.46 //
GP12vipce_pu:6873: tāvac ca trimārgaparivartair anekayugaparivṛttitiṣṭhann api raivataḥ śṛṇvan muhūrtam iva mene // ViP_4,1.47 //

GP12vipce_pu:6875: taṃ cāha bhagavān kathaya yo 'bhimatas te vara iti // ViP_4,1.49 //

GP12vipce_pu:6904: kuśasthalī yā tava bhūpa ramyā purī purābhūd amarāvatīva /

GP12vipce_pu:6968: tasya cāputrasyātinirvedān munīnām āśramamaṇḍale nivasataḥ kṛpālubhis tair munibhir apatyotpādanāya iṣṭiḥ kṛtā /
GP12vipce_pu:6969: tasyāṃ ca madhyarātrinivṛttāyāṃ mantrapūtajalapūrṇaṃ kalaśaṃ vedimadhye niveśya te munayaḥ suṣupuḥ // ViP_4,2.25 //
GP12vipce_pu:6970: teṣu ca supteṣv atitṛṭparītaḥ sa bhūpālas tam āśramaṃ viveśa // ViP_4,2.26 //

GP12vipce_pu:6973: prabuddhāś ca ṛṣayaḥ papracchuḥ kenaitan mantrapūtaṃ vāri pītam // ViP_4,2.28 //

GP12vipce_pu:6987: purukutsam ambarīṣaṃ ca mucakundaṃ ca tasyāṃ putratrayam utpādayām āsa // ViP_4,2.37 //

GP12vipce_pu:6989: bahvṛcaś ca saubharir nāma ṛṣir antarjale dvādaśābdaṃ kālam uvāsa // ViP_4,2.39 //

GP12vipce_pu:6992: sa cāpi tatsparśopacīyamānaharṣaprakarṣo bahuprakāraṃ tasya ṛṣeḥ paśyatas tair ātmajapautradauhitrādibhiḥ sahānudinaṃ bahuprakāraṃ reme // ViP_4,2.41
GP12vipce_pu:6993: athāntarjalāvasthitaḥ sa saubharir ekāgratāsamādhānam apahāyānudinaṃ tat tasya matsyasyātmajapautradauhitrādibhiḥ sahātiramaṇīyaṃ lalitam avekṣyācintayat
GP12vipce_pu:6994: aho dhanyo 'yam īdṛśam apy anabhimataṃ yonyantaram avāpyaibhir ātmajapautrādibhiḥ saha ramamāṇo 'tīvāsmākaṃ spṛhām utpādayati /
GP12vipce_pu:6995: vayam apy evaṃ putrādibhiḥ saha ramiṣyāmaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:6996: ity evam abhisamīkṣya sa tasmād antarjalān niṣkramya nirveṣṭukāmaḥ kanyārthaṃ māṃdhātāraṃ rājānam agacchat // ViP_4,2.42 //
GP12vipce_pu:6997: āgamanaśravaṇasamanantaraṃ cotthāya tena rājñā samyag arghādinā pūjitaḥ kṛtāsanaparigrahaḥ saubharir uvāca // ViP_4,2.43 //
GP12vipce_pu:6999: nirveṣṭukāmo 'smi narendra kanyāṃ prayaccha me mā praṇayaṃ vibhāṅkṣīḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7000: na hy arthinaḥ kāryavaśābhyupetāḥ kakutsthagotre vimukhāḥ prayānti // ViP_4,2.44 //
GP12vipce_pu:7001: anye 'pi santy eva nṛpāḥ pṛthivyāṃ kṣmāpāla yeṣāṃtanayāḥ prasūtāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7002: kiṃtv arthinām arthitadānadīkṣā kṛtavrataṃ ślāghyam idaṃ kulaṃ te // ViP_4,2.45 //
GP12vipce_pu:7003: śatārdhasaṃkhyās tava santi kanyās tāsāṃ mamaikāṃ nṛpate prayaccha /
GP12vipce_pu:7004: yat prārthanābhaṅgabhayād bibhemi tasmād ahaṃ rājavarātiduḥkhāt // ViP_4,2.46 //
GP12vipce_pu:7006: iti ṛṣivacanam ākarṇya sa rājā jarājarjaritadehaṃ tam ṛṣim ālokya pratyākhyānakātaras tasmāc ca bhagavataḥ śāpato bibhyatkiṃcidadhomukhaś ciraṃ dadhyau // ViP_4,2.47 //
GP12vipce_pu:7008: narendra kasmāt samupaiṣi cintām aśakyam uktaṃ na mayātra kiṃcit /

GP12vipce_pu:7011: atha tasya śāpabhītaḥ sapraśrayam uvācāsau rājā // ViP_4,2.49 //
GP12vipce_pu:7013: bhagavann asmatkulasthitir iyaṃ ya eva kanyāyā abhirucito 'bhijanavān varas tasmai kanyā pradīyate /
GP12vipce_pu:7015: katham apy eṣā saṃjātā tad evam upasthite na vidmaḥ kiṃ kurma ity etan mayā cintyate /
GP12vipce_pu:7016: ity abhihite ca tena bhūbhujā munir acintayat /

GP12vipce_pu:7018: evam astu tathā kariṣyāmīti saṃcintya māṃdhātāram uvāca // ViP_4,2.50 //
GP12vipce_pu:7019: yady evaṃ tadādiśyatām asmākaṃ praveśāya kanyāntaḥpuravarṣavaraḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7020: yadi kanyaiva kācin mām abhilaṣati tadāhaṃ dārasaṃgrahaṃ kariṣyāmīty anyathā cet tad alam asmākam etenātītakālārambhenety uktvā virarāma //
GP12vipce_pu:7022: tataś ca māṃdhātrā muniśāpaśaṅkitena kanyāntaḥpuravarṣavaraḥ samājñaptaḥ // ViP_4,2.52 //
GP12vipce_pu:7023: kanyāntaḥpuraṃ praviśann eva bhagavān akhilasiddhagandharvamanuṣyebhyo 'tiśayena kamanīyaṃ rūpam akarot // ViP_4,2.53 //

GP12vipce_pu:7039: kṛtānurūpavivāhaś ca maharṣiḥ sakalā eva tāḥ kanyāḥ svam āśramam anayat // ViP_4,2.60 //
GP12vipce_pu:7040: tatra cāśeṣaśilpiśilpapraṇetāraṃ dhātāram ivānyaṃ viśvakarmāṇam āhūya sakalakanyānām

GP12vipce_pu:7044: tataś ca paramarṣiṇā saubhariṇājñaptas teṣu gṛheṣv anapāyī nandanāmā mahānidhir āsāṃ cakre // ViP_4,2.63 //
GP12vipce_pu:7045: tato 'navaratabhakṣyabhojyalehyādyupabhogair āgatānugatabhṛtyādīn aharniśam aśeṣagṛheṣu tāḥ kṣitīśaduhitaro bhojayām āsuḥ // ViP_4,2.64 //
GP12vipce_pu:7046: ekadā tu duhitṛsnehākṛṣṭahṛdayaḥ sa mahīpatir atiduḥkhitās tāḥ sukhitā veti vicintya

GP12vipce_pu:7050: apy atra vatse bhavatyāḥ sukham uta kiṃcid asukham api te maharṣiḥ snehavān uta saṃsmaryate 'smadgṛhavāsasyety uktā tattanayā pitaram āha //
GP12vipce_pu:7051: tātātiramaṇīyaḥ prāsādo 'trātimanojñam upavanam atikalavākyavihaṃgābhirutāḥ protphullapadmākarā jalāśayāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7052: manonukūlabhakṣyabhojyānulepanavastra bhūṣaṇādibhogopabhogā mṛdūni śayanāni sarvasaṃpatsamavetam etad gārhasthyam tathāpi kena vā janmabhūmir na smaryate // ViP_4,2.68 //
GP12vipce_pu:7054: kiṃtv ekaṃ mamaitad duḥkhakāraṇaṃ yad asmadgṛhān maharṣir ayaṃ madbhartā na niṣkrāmati mamaiva kevalam atiprītyā samīpavartī nānyāsām asmadbhaginīnām
GP12vipce_pu:7055: evaṃ ca mama sahodaryā duḥkhitā ity evam atiduḥkhakāraṇam ity uktas tayā dvitīyaṃ prāsādam upetya svatanayāṃ pariṣvajyopaviṣṭas tathaiva pṛṣṭavān

GP12vipce_pu:7060: dṛṣṭas te bhagavan sumahān eṣa siddhiprabhāvo naivaṃvidham anyasya kasyacid asmābhir vibhūtivilasitam upalakṣitaṃ /

GP12vipce_pu:7150: śakayavanakāmbojapāradapahlavā hanyamānās tatkulaguruṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ // ViP_4,3.28 //

GP12vipce_pu:7165: tatheti ca ṛṣiṇābhihite 'lpair evāhobhiḥ keśinī putram ekam asamañjasaṃ nāma vaṃśadharam asūta /
