GP12vipce_pu:7526: te cāpi tena buddhimohenābhibhūyamānā brahmadviṣo dharmatyāgino vedavādaparāṅmukhā babhūvuḥ // ViP_4,9.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:7527: tataś ca tān apetadharmācārān indro jaghāna /
GP12vipce_pu:7529: etad indrasya svapadacyāvanārohaṇaṃ śrutvā puruṣaḥ svapadabhraṃśaṃ daurātmyaṃ ca nāpnoti // ViP_4,9.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:7532: tatputraḥ saṃjayas tasyāpi jayas tataś ca vijayas tasmāc ca jajñe kṛtaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7533: tasya harṣavardhano harṣavardhanasutaḥ sahadevas tasmād adīnas tasya jayatsenaḥ tataś
GP12vipce_pu:7534: ca saṃkṛtis tatputraḥ kṣatradharmā ity ete kṣatravṛddhasyāto nahuṣavaṃśaṃ pravakṣyāmīti // ViP_4,9.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:7537: yatiyayātisaṃyātyāyātiviyātikṛtisaṃjñā nahuṣasya ṣaṭ putrā mahābalaparākramā babhūvuḥ // ViP_4,10.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:7540: uśanasaś ca duhitaraṃ devayānīṃ śarmiṣṭhāṃ ca vārṣaparvaṇīm upayeme /
GP12vipce_pu:7542: yaduṃ ca turvasuṃ caiva devayānī vyajāyata /
GP12vipce_pu:7543: druhyuṃ cānuṃ ca pūruṃ ca śarmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī // ViP_4,10.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:7544: kāvyaśāpāc cākālenaiva yayātir jarām avāpa // ViP_4,10.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:7545: prasannaśukravacanāc ca svajarāṃ saṃkrāmayituṃ jyeṣṭhaputraṃ yadum uvāca // ViP_4,10.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:7546: tvanmātāmahaśāpād iyam akālenaiva jarā mām upasthitā /
GP12vipce_pu:7547: tām ahaṃ tasyaivānugrahād bhavataḥ saṃcārayāmy ekaṃ varṣasahasram atṛpto 'smi viṣayeṣu tvadvayasā viṣayān ahaṃ bhoktum icchāmi /
GP12vipce_pu:7548: nātra bhavatā pratyākhyānaṃ kartavyam ity uktaḥ sa naicchat tāṃ jarām ādātum /
GP12vipce_pu:7551: anantaraṃ ca durvasuṃ druhyum anuṃ ca pṛthivīpatir jarāgrahaṇārthaṃ svayauvanapradānāya cābhyarthayām āsa /
GP12vipce_pu:7552: tair apy ekaikaśyena pratyākhyātas tāñ chaśāpa // ViP_4,10.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:7554: sa cātipravaṇamatiḥ praṇamya pitaraṃ sabahumānaṃ mahān prasādo 'yam asmākam ity udāram abhidhāya jarāṃ pratijagrāha /
GP12vipce_pu:7555: svakīyaṃ ca yauvanaṃ pitre dadau // ViP_4,10.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:7556: so 'pi pauravaṃ yauvanam āsādya dharmāvirodhena yathākāmaṃ yathākālopapannaṃ yathotsāhaṃ viṣayāṃś cacāra /
GP12vipce_pu:7558: viśvācyā devayānyā ca sahopabhogaṃ bhuktvā kāmānām antam avāpsyāmīty anudinaṃ tanmanasko babhūva // ViP_4,10.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:7559: anudinaṃ copabhogataḥ kāmān atīvābhiramyān mene // ViP_4,10.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:7561: na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāmyati /
GP12vipce_pu:7563: yat pṛthivyāṃ vrīhiyavaṃ hiraṇyaṃ paśavaḥ striyaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7564: ekasyāpi na paryāptaṃ tasmāt tṛṣṇāṃ parityajet // ViP_4,10.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:7565: yadā na kurute bhāvaṃ sarvabhūteṣu pāpakam /
GP12vipce_pu:7566: samadṛṣṭes tadā puṃsaḥ sarvāḥ sukhamayā diśaḥ // ViP_4,10.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:7567: yā dustyajā durmatibhir yā na jīryati jīryataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7568: tāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ saṃtyajet prājñaḥ sukhenaivābhipūryate // ViP_4,10.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:7569: jīryanti jīryataḥ keśā dantā jīryanti jīryataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7570: dhanāśā jīvitāśā ca jīryato 'pi na jīryataḥ // ViP_4,10.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:7572: tathāpy anudinaṃ tṛṣṇā mamaiteṣv eva jāyate // ViP_4,10.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:7573: tasmād etām ahaṃ tyaktvā brahmaṇy ādhāya mānasam /
GP12vipce_pu:7574: nirdvandvo nirmamo bhūtvā cariṣyāmi mṛgaiḥ saha // ViP_4,10.19 //
GP12vipce_pu:7576: pūroḥ sakāśād ādāya jarāṃ dattvā ca yauvanam /
GP12vipce_pu:7577: rājye 'bhiṣicya pūruṃ ca prayayau tapase vanam // ViP_4,10.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:7579: pratīcyāṃ ca tathā druhyuṃ dakṣiṇāyāṃ tato yadum // ViP_4,10.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:7580: udīcyāṃ ca tathaivānuṃ kṛtvā maṇḍalino nṛpān /
GP12vipce_pu:7581: sarvapṛthvīpatiṃ pūruṃ so 'bhiṣicya yayau vanam // ViP_4,10.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:7584: ataḥ paraṃ yayāteḥ prathamaputrasya yador vaṃśam ahaṃ kathayāmi /
GP12vipce_pu:7589: yador vaṃśaṃ naraḥ śrutvā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate /
GP12vipce_pu:7590: yatrāvatīrṇaṃ viṣṇvākhyaṃ paraṃ brahma nirākṛti // ViP_4,11.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:7594: haihayaputro dharmas tasyāpi dharmanetras tataḥ kuntiḥ kunteḥ sāhaṃjit /
GP12vipce_pu:7596: tasmād bhadraśreṇyas tato durdamas tasmād dhanakaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7599: yo 'sau bhagavadaṃśam atrikulaprasūtaṃ dattātreyākhyam ārādhya bāhusahasram adharmasevānivāraṇaṃ
GP12vipce_pu:7600: dharmeṇa pṛthivījayaṃ dharmataś cānupālanam arātibhyo 'parājayam akhilajagatprakhyātapuruṣāc
GP12vipce_pu:7601: ca mṛtyum ity etān varān abhilaṣitavāṃl lebhe ca // ViP_4,11.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:7605: na nūnaṃ kārtavīryasya gatiṃ yāsyanti pārthivāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7606: yajñair dānais tapobhir vā praśrayeṇa śrutena ca // ViP_4,11.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:7608: evaṃ pañcāśītivarṣasahasrāṇy avyāhatārogyaśrībalaparākramo rājyam akarot // ViP_4,11.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:7613: tasya ca putraśatapradhānāḥ pañca putrā babhūvuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7621: yato vṛṣṇisaṃjñām etad gotram avāpa // ViP_4,11.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:7632: teṣāṃ ca pṛthuyaśāḥ pṛthukarmā pṛthujayaḥ pṛthukīrtiḥ pṛthudānaḥ pṛthuśravāś ca ṣaṭ putrāḥ pradhānāḥ // ViP_4,12.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:7634: tasmād uśanā yo vājimedhānāṃ śatam ājahāra /
GP12vipce_pu:7637: tataḥ parāvṛt parāvṛto rukmeṣupṛthujyāmaghapālitaharitasaṃjñās tasya pañcātmajā babhūvuḥ // ViP_4,12.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:7638: atrāpy ayam adyāpi jyāmaghasya śloko gīyate /
GP12vipce_pu:7639: bhāryāvaśyās tu ye kecid bhaviṣyanty atha vā mṛtāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7640: teṣāṃ tu jyāmaghaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ śaibyāpatir abhūn nṛpaḥ // ViP_4,12.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:7641: aputrā tasya sā patnī śaibyā nāma tathāpy asau /
GP12vipce_pu:7642: apatyakāmo 'pi bhayān nānyāṃ bhāryām avindata // ViP_4,12.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:7643: sa tv ekadā atiprabhūtagajaturagarathasaṃmardātidāruṇe mahāhave yudhyamānaḥ sakalam evārāticakram ajayat /
GP12vipce_pu:7644: tac cāricakram apāstaputrakalatrabandhubalakośaṃ svam adhiṣṭhānaṃ parityajya diśaḥ pravidrutam // ViP_4,12.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:7645: tasmiṃś ca vidrute 'titrāsalolāyatalocanayugalaṃ trāhi trāhi tātāmba bhrātar ity ākulavilāpavidhuraṃ rājakanyāratnam adrākṣīt // ViP_4,12.7
GP12vipce_pu:7646: taddarśanāc ca tasyām anurāgānugatāntarātmā sa nṛpo 'cintayat /
GP12vipce_pu:7647: sādhv idaṃ mamāpatyavirahitasya vandhyābhartuḥ sāmprataṃ vidhināpatyakāraṇaṃ kanyāratnam upapāditam /
GP12vipce_pu:7648: tad etat udvahāmy athaināṃ syandanam āropya svam adhiṣṭhānaṃ nayāmi // ViP_4,12.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:7649: tayaiva devyā śaibyayāham anujñātaḥ samudvakṣyāmīty athaināṃ ratham āropya svanagaram agacchat // ViP_4,12.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:7650: vijayinaṃ ca rājānam aśeṣapaurabhṛtyaparijanāmātyasamavetā śaibyā draṣṭum adhiṣṭhānadvāram āgatā // ViP_4,12.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:7651: sā cāvalokya rājñaḥ savyapārśvavartinīṃ kanyām īṣadudbhūtāmarṣasphuradadharapallavā rājānam avocat /
GP12vipce_pu:7652: aticapalacittātra syandane keyam āropitety asāv apy anālocitottaravacano 'tibhayāt tām āha snuṣā mameyam iti // ViP_4,12.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:7654: nāhaṃ prasūtā putreṇa nānyā patny abhavat tava /
GP12vipce_pu:7655: snuṣāsaṃbandhatā hy eṣā katamena sutena te // ViP_4,12.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:7658: yas te janiṣyaty ātmajas tasyeyam anāgata eva bhāryā nirūpitety ākarṇyodbhūtamṛduhāsā tathety āha praviveśa ca rājñā sahādhiṣṭhānam // ViP_4,12.13
GP12vipce_pu:7659: anantaraṃ cātiśuddhalagnahorāṃśakāvayavoktakṛtaputrajanmālāpaguṇād vayasaḥ pariṇāmam upagatāpi śaibyā svalpair evāhobhir garbham avāpa // ViP_4,12.14
GP12vipce_pu:7661: tasya ca vidarbha iti pitā nāma cakre /
GP12vipce_pu:7662: sa ca tāṃ snuṣām upayeme // ViP_4,12.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:7666: dhṛteḥ kaiśikaḥ kaiśikasyāpi cediḥ putro 'bhūd yasya saṃtatau caidyā bhūpālāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7670: tasmād api jīmūtas tato vikṛtis tataś ca bhīmarathaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7671: tasmān navarathas tasyāpi daśarathas tataś ca śakunis tattanayaḥ karambhiḥ karambher devarāto 'bhavat /
GP12vipce_pu:7672: tasyāpi devakṣatro devakṣatrān madhur madhor anavaratho 'navarathāt kuruvatsas tataś cānurathaḥ tataḥ puruhotro jajñe /
GP12vipce_pu:7673: tataś cāṃśus tataś ca satvataḥ satvatād ete sātvatāḥ ity etāṃ jyāmaghasaṃtatiṃ samyag chraddhāsamanvitaḥ śrutvā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate // ViP_4,12.17
GP12vipce_pu:7681: babhruḥ śreṣṭho manuṣyāṇāṃ devair devāvṛdhaḥ samaḥ // ViP_4,13.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:7682: puruṣāḥ ṣaṭ ca ṣaṣṭiś ca ṣaṭ sahasrāṇi cāṣṭa ca /
GP12vipce_pu:7683: ye 'mṛtatvam anuprāptā babhror devāvṛdhād api // ViP_4,13.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:7684: mahābhojas tv atidharmātmā tasyānvaye bhojā mārtikāvatā babhūvuḥ // ViP_4,13.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:7685: vṛṣṇeḥ sumitro yudhājic ca putrāv abhūtām /
GP12vipce_pu:7686: tataś cānamitraśinī tathānamitrān nighno nighnasya prasenasatrājitau /
GP12vipce_pu:7688: ekadā tv ambhonidhitīrasaṃśrayaḥ sūryaṃ satrājitas tuṣṭāva tanmanaskatayā ca bhāsvān abhiṣṭūyamāno 'gratas tasya tasthau /
GP12vipce_pu:7689: aspaṣṭamūrtidharaṃ cainam ālokya satrājitaḥ sūryam āha /
GP12vipce_pu:7690: yathaiva vyomni vahnipiṇḍopamam aham apaśyaṃ tathaivādyāgrato gatam apy atra na kiṃcid bhagavatā prasādīkṛtaṃ viśeṣam upalakṣayāmi //
GP12vipce_pu:7691: ityevam ukte bhagavatā sūryeṇa nijakaṇṭhād unmucya syamantakanāmā mahāmaṇir avatāryaikānte nyastaḥ // ViP_4,13.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:7692: tatas tam ātāmrojjvalahrasvavapuṣam īṣadāpiṅgalanayanam ādityam adrākṣīt /
GP12vipce_pu:7695: sa ca tad eva maṇiratnam ayācata /
GP12vipce_pu:7696: sa cāpi tasmai tad dattvā viyati svadhiṣṇyam āruroha // ViP_4,13.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:7697: satrājito 'py amalamaṇiratnasanāthakaṇṭhatayā sūrya iva tejobhir aśeṣadigantarāṇy udbhāsayan dvārakāṃ viveśa // ViP_4,13.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:7698: dvārakāvāsijanapadas tu tam āyāntam avekṣya bhagavantam ādipuruṣaṃ puruṣottamam avanibhārāvataraṇāyāṃśena mānuṣarūpadhāriṇaṃ praṇipatyāha /
GP12vipce_pu:7699: bhagavan bhagavantam ayaṃ nūnaṃ draṣṭum āyāty āditya ity ākarṇya prahasya ca tān āha /
GP12vipce_pu:7700: bhagavān nāyam ādityaḥ satrājito yam ādityadattaṃ syamanatakākhyaṃ mahāmaṇiṃ bibhrad atropayāti /
GP12vipce_pu:7701: tad enaṃ visrabdhāḥ paśyata ity uktās te yayuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7702: sa ca taṃ syamantakākhyaṃ mahāmaṇim ātmaniveśane cakre // ViP_4,13.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:7703: pratidinaṃ ca tan maṇiratnapravaram aṣṭau kanakabhārān sravati /
GP12vipce_pu:7704: tatprabhāvāc ca sakalasyaiva rāṣṭrasyopasargānāvṛṣṭivyālāgnitoyadurbhikṣādibhayaṃ na bhavati // ViP_4,13.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:7705: acyuto 'pi tad ratnam ugrasenasya bhūpater yogyam etad iti lipsāṃ cakre /
GP12vipce_pu:7707: satrājito apy acyuto mām etad yācayiṣyatīty avagataratnalobhaḥ svabhrātre prasenāya tad ratnam dattavān /
GP12vipce_pu:7708: tac ca śucinā dhriyamāṇam aśeṣam eva suvarṇasrāvādikaṃ guṇam utpādayati /
GP12vipce_pu:7709: anyathā ya enaṃ dhārayati tam eva hantīty /
GP12vipce_pu:7710: asāv api prasenaḥ syamantakena kaṇṭhāsaktenāśvam āruhyāṭavyāṃ mṛgayām agacchat /
GP12vipce_pu:7712: sāśvaṃ ca taṃ nihatya siṃho 'py amalamaṇiratnam āsyāgreṇādāya gantum udyata ṛkṣādhipatinā jāmbavatā dṛṣṭo ghātitaś ca /
GP12vipce_pu:7713: jāmbavān apy amalaṃ tan maṇiratnam ādāya svabilaṃ praviveśa /
GP12vipce_pu:7714: sukumārasaṃjñāya ca bālakāya krīḍanakam akarot // ViP_4,13.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:7715: anāgacchati ca tasmin prasene kṛṣṇo maṇiratnam abhilaṣitavān /
GP12vipce_pu:7716: na ca prāptavān nūnam etad asya karmety akhila eva yadulokaḥ parasparaṃ karṇākarṇy'kathayat // ViP_4,13.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:7717: viditalokāpavādavṛttāntaś ca bhagavān yadusainyaparivāraḥ prasenāśvapadavīm anusasāra /
GP12vipce_pu:7718: dadarśa cāśvasametaṃ prasenaṃ nihataṃ siṃhenākhilajanapadamadhye siṃhapadadarśanakṛtapariśuddhiḥ siṃhapadam anusasāra // ViP_4,13.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:7719: ṛkṣavinihataṃ ca siṃham apy alpe bhūmibhāge dṛṣṭvā tataś ca tadratnagauravād ṛkṣasyāpi padāny anuyayau /
GP12vipce_pu:7720: giritaṭe ca sakalam eva yadusainyam avasthāpya tatpadānusārī ṛkṣabilaṃ praviveśa /
GP12vipce_pu:7721: ardhapraviṣṭaś ca dhātryāḥ sukumārakam ullāpayantyā vāṇīṃ śuśrāva /
GP12vipce_pu:7722: siṃhaḥ prasenam avadhīt siṃho jāmbavatā hataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7723: sukumāraka mā rodīs tava hy eṣa syamantakaḥ // ViP_4,13.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:7724: ity ākarṇyalabdhasyamantakodantaḥ praviṣṭaḥ kumārakrīḍanakīkṛtaṃ ca dhātryā haste tejobhir jājvalyamānaṃ syamantakaṃ dadarśa // ViP_4,13.16
GP12vipce_pu:7725: taṃ ca syamantakābhilāṣicakṣuṣam apūrvapuruṣam āgataṃ samavekṣya dhātrī trāhi trāhīti vyājahāra // ViP_4,13.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:7727: tayoś ca parasparam yudhyator dvayor yuddham ekaviṃśatidināny abhavat /
GP12vipce_pu:7728: te ca yadusainikās tatra saptāṣṭa dināni tanniṣkrāntim udīkṣamāṇās tasthuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7729: aniṣkramamāṇe ca madhuripāv asāv avaśyam atra bile 'tyantaṃ nāśam āpto bhaviṣyaty
GP12vipce_pu:7730: anyathā tasya jīvataḥ katham etāvanti dināni śatrujaye vyākṣepo bhavatīti kṛtādhyavasāyā
GP12vipce_pu:7731: dvārakām āgatya hataḥ kṛṣṇa iti kathayām āsuḥ // ViP_4,13.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:7732: tadbāndhavāś ca tatkālocitam akhilam uparatakriyākalāpaṃ cakruḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7735: nirjitaś ca bhagavatā jāmbavān praṇipatyāha V vyājahāra /
GP12vipce_pu:7736: asurasurayakṣagandharvarākṣasādibhir apy akhilair bhagavān na jetuṃ śakyaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7737: kim utāvanigocarair alpavīryair narair narāvayavabhūtaiś ca tiryagyonyanusṛtibhiḥ kiṃ punar asmadvidhaiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7738: avaśyaṃ bhagavato 'smatsvāmino nārāyaṇasya sakalajagatparāyaṇasyāṃśena bhagavatā bhavitavyam ity uktas tasmai bhagavān akhilāvanibhārāvatāram ācacakṣe /
GP12vipce_pu:7740: sa ca praṇipatyainaṃ punar api prasādya jāmbavatīṃ nāma kanyāṃ gṛhāgamanārghyabhūtāṃ grāhayām āsa // ViP_4,13.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:7741: syamantakamaṇim apy asau praṇipatya tasmai pradadau /
GP12vipce_pu:7742: acyuto 'py atipraṇatāt tasmād agrāhyam api tan maṇiratnam ātmasaṃśodhanāya jagrāha // ViP_4,13.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:7744: bhagavadāgamanodbhūtaharṣotkarṣasya dvārakāvāsijanasya kṛṣṇāvalokanāt tatkṣaṇam evātipariṇatavayaso 'pi navayauvanam ivābhavat /
GP12vipce_pu:7745: ānakadundubhiṃ ca diṣṭyā diṣṭyeti sakalayādavāḥ striyaś ca sabhājayām āsuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7746: bhagavān api yathānubhūtam aśeṣayādavasamāje yathāvad ācacakṣe /
GP12vipce_pu:7747: syamantakaṃ ca satrājitāya dattvā mithyābhiśastiviśuddhim avāpa // ViP_4,13.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:7749: satrājito 'pi mayāsyābhūtamalinam āropitam iti jātasaṃtrāsaḥ svasutāṃ satyabhāmāṃ bhagavate bhāryāṃ dadau /
GP12vipce_pu:7750: tāṃ cākrūrakṛtavarmaśatadhanvapramukhā yādavāḥ pūrvaṃ varayāṃ āsuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7751: tatas tatpradānād avajñātam ivātmānaṃ manyamānāḥ satrājite vairānubandhaṃ cakruḥ // ViP_4,13.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:7753: ayam atidurātmā satrājito yo 'smābhir bhavatā ca abhyarthito 'py ātmajām asmān bhavantaṃ cāvigaṇayya kṛṣṇāya dattavān /
GP12vipce_pu:7754: tad alam anena jīvatā ghātayitvainaṃ tan mahāratnaṃ tvayā kiṃ na gṛhyate /
GP12vipce_pu:7755: vayam abhyupapatsyāmo yady acyutas tavopari vairānubandhaṃ kariṣyatīti // ViP_4,13.25 //
GP12vipce_pu:7756: evam uktas tathety asāv apy āha /
GP12vipce_pu:7757: jatugṛhadagdhānāṃ pāṇḍutanayānāṃ viditaparamārtho 'pi bhagavān duryodhanaprayatnaśaithilyakaraṇārtham ānukūlyakaraṇāya vāraṇāvataṃ gataḥ //
GP12vipce_pu:7758: gate ca tasmin suptam eva satrājitaṃ śatadhanvā jaghāna maṇiratnaṃ cādade /
GP12vipce_pu:7759: pitṛvadhāmarṣapūrṇā ca satyabhāmā śīghraṃ syandanam ārūḍhā vāraṇāvataṃ gatvā bhagavate 'haṃ pratipāditety akṣāntimatā śatadhanvanāsmatpitā vyāpāditaḥ
GP12vipce_pu:7762: tad ālocya yad atra yuktaṃ tat kriyatām iti kṛṣṇam āha // ViP_4,13.27 //
GP12vipce_pu:7763: tayā caivam uktaḥ parituṣṭāntaḥkaraṇo 'pi kṛṣṇaḥ satyabhāmām amarṣatāmralocanaḥ prāha /
GP12vipce_pu:7766: na hy anullaṅghya varapādapaṃ tatkṛtanīḍāśrayiṇo vihaṃgā vadhyante /
GP12vipce_pu:7767: tad alam atyartham amunāsmatpurataḥ śokapreritavākyaparikareṇety uktvā dvārakām abhyetya baladevam ekānte vāsudevaḥ prāha /
GP12vipce_pu:7770: tadubhayavināśāt tan maṇiratnam āvābhyāṃ sāmānyaṃ bhaviṣyati // ViP_4,13.28 //
GP12vipce_pu:7771: tad uttiṣṭhāruhyatāṃ rathaḥ śatadhanvanidhanāyodyamaṃ kurv ity abhihitas tatheti samanvicchitavān /
GP12vipce_pu:7772: kṛtodyogau ca tāv ubhāv upalabhya śatadhanvā kṛtavarmāṇam upetya pārṣṇipūraṇakarmanimittam acodayat /
GP12vipce_pu:7774: nāhaṃ balabhadravāsudevābhyāṃ saha virodhāyālam ity uktaś cākrūram acodayat /
GP12vipce_pu:7778: vāraṇāpakarṣaṇāviṣkṛtamahimorusīreṇa sīriṇā ca saha sakalajagadvandyānām amaravarāṇām
GP12vipce_pu:7779: api yoddhuṃ samarthaḥ kim utāhaṃ tadanyataḥ śaraṇam abhilaṣyatām // ViP_4,13.29 //
GP12vipce_pu:7781: yady asmatparitrāṇāsamarthaṃ bhavān ātmānam avagacchati tad ayam asmanmaṇiḥ saṃgṛhya rakṣyatām ityuktaḥ so 'py āha /
GP12vipce_pu:7782: yady antāyām apy avasthāyāṃ na kasmaicid bhavān kathayiṣyati tad aham enaṃ grahīṣyāmīti /
GP12vipce_pu:7783: tathety ukte cākrūras tan maṇiratnaṃ jagrāha // ViP_4,13.30 //
GP12vipce_pu:7786: sā ca vaḍavā śatayojanapramāṇamārgam atītya punar api vāhyamānā mithilāvanoddeśe prāṇān utsasarja /
GP12vipce_pu:7787: śatadhanvāpi tāṃ parityajya padātir evādravat // ViP_4,13.32 //
GP12vipce_pu:7789: tāvad atraiva syandane bhavatā stheyam aham enam adhamācāraṃ padātinam anugamya yāvad ghātayāmi /
GP12vipce_pu:7791: naite 'śvā bhavatemaṃ bhūmibhāgam ullaṅghya neyāḥ // ViP_4,13.33 //
GP12vipce_pu:7792: tathety uktvā balabhadro ratha eva tasthau /
GP12vipce_pu:7793: kṛṣṇo 'pi dvikrośamātraṃ bhūmibhāgam anusṛtya dūrasthitasyaiva cakraṃ kṣiptvā śatadhanvanaḥ śiraś ciccheda /
GP12vipce_pu:7794: taccharīrāmbarādiṣu ca bahuprakāram anviṣyann api syamantakaṃ maṇiṃ nāvāpa yadā tadopagamya balabhadram āha /
GP12vipce_pu:7798: dhik tvāṃ yas tvam evam arthalipsur etac ca te bhrātṛtvān marṣaye /
GP12vipce_pu:7800: na me dvārakayā na bandhubhiḥ kāryam alam ebhir mamāgrato 'līkaśapathair ity ākṣipya taṃ kathaṃcit prasādyamāno 'pi na tasthau /
GP12vipce_pu:7802: janakaś cārghyapūrvakam enaṃ gṛhaṃ praveśayām āsa /
GP12vipce_pu:7805: yāvac ca janakarājagṛhe balabhadro 'vatasthe tāvad dhārtarāṣṭro duryodhanas tatsakāśād gadāśikṣām aśikṣata /
GP12vipce_pu:7806: varṣatrayānte ca babhrūgrasenaprabhṛtibhir yādavair na tad ratnaṃ kṛṣṇenāpahṛtam iti kṛtāvagatibhir videhapurīṃ gatvā baladevaḥ saṃpratyāyya dvārakām ānītaḥ // ViP_4,13.35 //
GP12vipce_pu:7808: savanagatau hi kṣatriyavaiśyau nighnan brahmahā bhavatīty ato dīkṣākavacaṃ praviṣṭa eva tasthau /
GP12vipce_pu:7809: dviṣaṣṭivarṣāṇy evaṃ tanmaṇiprabhāvāt tatropasargadurbhikṣamarakādikaṃ nābhūt // ViP_4,13.36 //
GP12vipce_pu:7810: athākrūrapakṣīyair bhojaiḥ śatrughne sātvatasya prapautre vyāpādite bhojaiḥ sahākrūro dvārakām apahāyāpakrāntaḥ // ViP_4,13.37 //
GP12vipce_pu:7813: kim yad idam ekadaiva pracuropadravāgamanam etad ālocyatām // ViP_4,13.38 //
GP12vipce_pu:7815: asyākrūrasya pitā śvaphalko yatra yatrābhūt tatra tatra durbhikṣamarakānāvṛṣtyādikaṃ nābhūt // ViP_4,13.39 //
GP12vipce_pu:7818: kāśīrājapatnyāś ca garbhe kanyāpūrvam āsīt // ViP_4,13.40 //
GP12vipce_pu:7820: evaṃ ca tasya garbhasya dvādaśa varṣāṇy aniṣkrāmato yayuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7821: kāśīrājaś ca garbhasthāṃ tām ātmajām āha /
GP12vipce_pu:7822: putri kasmān na jāyase niṣkramyatām āsyaṃ te draṣṭum icchāmy ahaṃ svakāṃ ca mātaraṃ kim iti ciraṃ kleśayiṣyasīty ukte garbhasthaiva vyājahāra
GP12vipce_pu:7823: tāta yady ekaikāṃ gāṃ dine dine brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayacchasi tad aham anyais tribhir varṣair asmād garbhād avaśyaṃ niṣkramiṣyāmīti /
GP12vipce_pu:7824: etac ca tadvacanam ākarṇya rājā dine dine brāhmaṇāya gāṃ prādāt /
GP12vipce_pu:7826: tatas tasyāḥ pitā gāndinīti nāma cakāra /
GP12vipce_pu:7827: tāṃ ca gāndinīṃ kanyāṃ śvaphalkāya priyopakāriṇe gṛhāgatāyārghabhūtāṃ prādāt // ViP_4,13.41 //
GP12vipce_pu:7830: katham asminn apakrānte marakadurbhikṣādyupadravā na bhaviṣyanti /
GP12vipce_pu:7831: tad ayam ānīyatām ity alam atiguṇavaty aparādhānveṣaneneti // ViP_4,13.43 //
GP12vipce_pu:7832: yaduvṛddhasyāndhakasyaitad vacanam ākarṇya keśavograsenabalabhadrapurogamair yadubhiḥ kṛtāparādhatitikṣābhavam abhayaṃ dattvā śvāphalkiḥ svapuram ānītaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7833: tatra cāgatamātra eva tasya tatsthasya maṇer anubhāvad anāvṛṣṭimarakadurbhikṣavyālādyupadravaḥ śaśāma /
GP12vipce_pu:7835: svalpam etat kāraṇaṃ yad ayaṃ gāndinyāṃ śvaphalkenākrūro jātaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7837: tan nūnam asya sakāśe sa mahāmaṇiḥ syamantakākhyas tiṣṭhati /
GP12vipce_pu:7839: ayam api ca yajñād anantaram anyat kratvantaraṃ anantaram ca tasmād yajñāntaraṃ yajatīti /
GP12vipce_pu:7840: alpopādānaṃ cāsyā saṃśayam atrāsau varamaṇis tiṣṭhatīti kṛtādhyavasāyo 'nyat prayojanam uddiśya sakalayādavasamājam ātmageha evācīkarat // ViP_4,13.45
GP12vipce_pu:7841: tatra copaviṣṭeṣv akhileṣu yādaveṣu pūrvaprayojanam upanyasya paryavasite ca tasmin prasaṅgāgataparihāsakathām akrūreṇa saha kṛtvā janārdanas tam akrūram āha // ViP_4,13.46 //
GP12vipce_pu:7842: dānapate jānīma eva vayaṃ yathā śatadhanvanā tad akhilajagatsārabhūtaṃ syamantakaratnaṃ bhavataḥ samarpitaṃ tad etad rāṣṭropakārakaṃ bhavataḥ sakāśe tiṣṭhatīti /
GP12vipce_pu:7843: tiṣṭhatu sarva eva vayaṃ tatprabhāvaphalabhujaḥ kiṃ tv eṣa balabhadro 'smān āśaṅkitavāṃs tad asmatprītaye darśayety abhihitaḥ saratnaḥ so 'cintayat
GP12vipce_pu:7844: kim atrānuṣṭheyam anyathā ced bravīmy ahaṃ tat kevalāmbaratirodhānam anviṣyanto ratnam
GP12vipce_pu:7845: etad drakṣyantīty anveṣaṇaṃ na kṣemam iti saṃcintya tam akhilajagatkāraṇabhūtaṃ nārāyaṇam āhākrūraḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7846: bhagavan mamaitat syamantakaratnaṃ śatadhanvanā samarpitam // ViP_4,13.48 //
GP12vipce_pu:7847: apagate ca tasminn adya śvaḥ paraśvo vā bhagavān māṃ yācayiṣyatīti etāvantaṃ kālam atikṛcchreṇādhārayam /
GP12vipce_pu:7848: tasya ca dhāraṇakleśenāham aśeṣopabhogeṣv asaṅgimānaso na vedmi svasukhakalām api // ViP_4,13.49 //
GP12vipce_pu:7849: etāvanmātram apy aśeṣarāṣṭropakārī dhārayituṃ na śaknotīti māṃ bhavān maṃsyata ity ātmanā na coditam // ViP_4,13.50 //
GP12vipce_pu:7850: tad idaṃ syamantakaratnaṃ gṛhyatām icchayā yasyābhimataṃ tasya samarpyatām /
GP12vipce_pu:7852: tataś ca niṣkrāmya syamantakamaṇiṃ tasmin yadusamāje mumoca /
GP12vipce_pu:7853: muktamātre ca tenātikāntyā tad akhilam āsthānam uddyotitam // ViP_4,13.52 //
GP12vipce_pu:7855: sa eṣa maṇir yaḥ śatadhanvanāsmākaṃ samarpito yasyāyaṃ sa enaṃ gṛhṇātv iti /
GP12vipce_pu:7856: tam ālokya sarvayādavānāṃ sādhu sādhv iti vismitavacasāṃ vāco 'śrūyanta /
GP12vipce_pu:7857: tam ālokyamamāyam acyutenaiva sāmānyaḥ samanvicchita iti balabhadraḥ saspṛho 'bhavat // ViP_4,13.53 //
GP12vipce_pu:7858: mamedaṃ pitṛdhanam ity atīva ca satyabhāmā spṛhāṃ cakāra /
GP12vipce_pu:7859: balabhadrasatyānanāvalokanāt kṛṣṇo 'py ātmānaṃ cakrāntarāvasthitam iva mene /
GP12vipce_pu:7861: etad dhi maṇiratnam ātmasaṃśodhanāya eṣāṃ yadūnāṃ darśitam etac ca mama balabhadrasya ca sāmānyaṃ pitṛdhanaṃ caitat satyabhāmāyā nānyasya //
GP12vipce_pu:7862: etat sarvakālaṃ śucinā brahmacaryeṇa dhriyamāṇam aśeṣarāṣṭrasyopakārakam aśucinā dhriyamāṇam ādhāram eva hanti // ViP_4,13.55 //
GP12vipce_pu:7866: tad ayaṃ yaduloko 'haṃ balabhadraḥ satyā ca tvāṃ dānapate prārthayāmaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7868: tvadsthaṃ cāsya rāṣṭrasyopakārakaṃ tad bhavān aśeṣarāṣṭropakāranimittam etat pūrvavad dhārayatu /
GP12vipce_pu:7869: tvayānyan na vaktavyam ity ukto dānapatis tathety uktvā jagrāha ca tan mahāratnam /
GP12vipce_pu:7870: tataḥ prabhṛti ca akrūraḥ prakaṭenaivātitejasā jājjvalyamānenātmakaṇṭhāsaktenāditya ivāṃśumālī cacāra // ViP_4,13.56 //
GP12vipce_pu:7871: ity etāṃ bhagavato mithyābhiśastikṣālanāṃ yaḥ smarati na tasya kadācid alpāpi mithyābhiśastir bhavati /
GP12vipce_pu:7877: tasmād apy asaṅgas tatputraś ca tūṇis tūṇer yugaṃdharaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7880: tasmāc ca śvaphalkas tatprabhāvaḥ kathita eva /
GP12vipce_pu:7883: tathopamadgur upamadgor mṛduraviśārimejayagirikṣatropakṣatraśatrughnārimardanadharmadṛgdṛṣṭavarmagandhamojavāhaprativāhākhyāḥ putrāḥ sutārākhyā ca kanyā /
GP12vipce_pu:7887: kukurād dhṛṣṭas tasmāc ca kapotaromā tataś ca vilomā /
GP12vipce_pu:7890: tasyāpy āhukaḥ putra āhukī ca kanyā // ViP_4,14.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:7892: devavān upadevaḥ sahadevo devarakṣito devakasyāpi catvāraḥ putrāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7893: teṣāṃ ca vṛkadevopadevā devarakṣitā śrīdevā śāntidevā sahadevā devakī ca sapta bhaginyaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7894: tāś ca sarvā eva vasudeva upayeme /
GP12vipce_pu:7896: kaṃsā kaṃsavatī sutanū rāṣṭrapālī kaṅkī ca ugrasenatanūjāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7898: vidūrathāc chūraḥ śūrāc chamī śaminaḥ pratikṣatraḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7899: tasmāt svayaṃbhojas tataś ca hṛdikaḥ // ViP_4,14.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:7901: devamīḍhuṣasya śūrasya māriṣā nāma patny abhavat // ViP_4,14.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:7902: tasyāṃ cāsau daśa putrān ajanayad vasudevapūrvān /
GP12vipce_pu:7903: vasudevasya jātamātrasyaiva tadgṛhe bhagavadaṃśāvatāram avyāhatadṛṣṭyā paśyadbhir devair divyānakadundubhayaś ca vāditāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7906: pṛthā śrutadevā śrutakīrtiḥ śrutaśravā rājādhidevī ca vasudevādīnāṃ pañca bhaginyo 'bhavan // ViP_4,14.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:7908: tasmai cāputrāya pṛthām ātmajāṃ vidhinā śūro dattavān /
GP12vipce_pu:7910: tasyāṃ ca dharmānilaśakrair yudhiṣṭhirabhīmārjunākhyās trayaḥ putrāḥ samutpāditāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7911: pūrvam anūḍhāyāś ca bhagavatā bhāsvatā kānīnaḥ karṇo nāma putro 'janyata // ViP_4,14.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:7913: nāsatyadasrābhyāṃ tasyām api nakulasahadevau pāṇḍoḥ putrau janitau /
GP12vipce_pu:7914: śrutadevāṃ tu vṛddhaśarmā nāma kārūśa upayeme /
GP12vipce_pu:7917: tasyāṃ saṃtardanādayaḥ kaikeyāḥ pañca putrā babhūvuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7921: sa hi pūrvam apy anācāravikramasaṃpanno daityānām ādipuruṣo hiraṇyakaśipur abhūt // ViP_4,14.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:7923: punar apy akṣatavīryaśauryasaṃpatparākramaguṇaḥ samākrāntasakalatrailokyeśvarapratāpo daśānano 'bhavat // ViP_4,14.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:7924: bahukālopabhuktabhagavatsakāśād avāptaśarīrapātodbhavapuṇyaphalo 'tha bhagavatāeva rāghavarūpiṇā so 'pi nidhanam upapāditaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7926: śiśupālatve 'pi bhagavato bhūbhārāvatāraṇāyāvatīrṇāṃśasya puṇḍarīkanayanākhyasyopari dveṣānubandham atitarāñ cakāra /
GP12vipce_pu:7927: bhagavatā ca nidhanam upanītas tatraiva paramātmabhūte manasas tadekāgratayā tatraiva sāyujyam avāpa // ViP_4,14.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:7928: bhagavān hi prasanno yathābhilaṣitaṃ dadāty aprasanno 'pi nighnan divyam anupamaṃ sthānaṃ prayacchatīti // ViP_4,14.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:7932: avāpa nihato bhogān aprāpyān amarair api // ViP_4,15.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:7933: na layaṃ tatra tenaiva nihataḥ sa kathaṃ punaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7934: saṃprāptaḥ śiśupālatve sāyujyaṃ śāśvate harau // ViP_4,15.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:7935: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ sarvadharmabhṛtāṃ vara /
GP12vipce_pu:7936: kautūhalapareṇaitat pṛṣṭo me vaktum arhasi // ViP_4,15.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:7938: daityeśvarasya tu vadhāyākhilalokotpattisthitivināśakāriṇāpūrvaṃ tanugrahaṇaṃ kurvatā nṛsiṃharūpam āviṣkṛtam /
GP12vipce_pu:7939: tatra tu hiraṇyakaśipor viṣṇur ayam ity etan na manasy abhūt // ViP_4,15.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:7940: niratiśayapuṇyajātasamudbhūtam etat sattvam iti rajodrekapreritaikāgramatis tadbhāvanāyogāt
GP12vipce_pu:7943: nātas tasminn anādinidhane parabrahmabhūte bhagavaty anālambanīkṛte manasas tallayam /
GP12vipce_pu:7945: evāsin nāyam acyuta ity āsaktir vipadyato 'ntaḥkaraṇasya mānuṣabuddhir eva kevalam
GP12vipce_pu:7947: punar apy acyutavinipātamātraphalam akhilabhūmaṇḍalaślāghyacedirājakule janmāvyāhataṃ aiśvaryaṃ śiśupālatve cāvāpa // ViP_4,15.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:7948: tatra tv akhilāny eva bhagavannāmakāraṇāny abhavan /
GP12vipce_pu:7949: tataś ca tatkāraṇakṛtānāṃ teṣām aśeṣāṇām evācyutanāmnām anavaratam anekajanmasaṃvardhitavidveṣānubandhicitto vinindanasaṃtarjanādiṣūccāraṇam akarot // ViP_4,15.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:7950: tac ca rūpam utphullapadmadalāmalākṣam atyujjvalapītavastradhāry amalakirīṭakeyūrakaṭakopaśobhitam
GP12vipce_pu:7953: tam evākrośeṣūccārayaṃs tam eva hṛdayena dhārayann ātmavadhāya bhagavadastacakrāṃśumālojjvalam
GP12vipce_pu:7954: akṣayatejaḥsvarūpaṃ paraṃ brahmasvarūpam apagatarāgadveṣādidoṣaṃ bhagavantam adrākṣīt // ViP_4,15.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:7955: tāvac ca bhagavaccakreṇāśu vyāpāditas tena tatsmaraṇadagdhākhilāghasaṃcayo bhagavataivāntam upanītas tasminn eva layam upayayau /
GP12vipce_pu:7957: ayaṃ hi bhagavān kīrtitaḥ saṃsmṛtaś ca dveṣānubandhenāpy akhilasurāsurādidurlabhaṃ phalaṃ prayacchati kim uta samyag bhaktimatām /
GP12vipce_pu:7959: balabhadrasāraṇaśaṭhadurmadādīn putrān rohiṇyām ānakadundubhir utpādayām āsa /
GP12vipce_pu:7966: ānakadundubhir devakyām api kīrtimatsuṣeṇodāyibhadrasenarjudāsabhadradevākhyāḥ ṣaṭ putrā jajñire // ViP_4,15.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:7967: tāṃś ca sarvān eva kaṃso ghātitavān /
GP12vipce_pu:7968: anantaraṃ ca saptamaṃ garbham ardharātre bhagavatprahitā yoganidrā rohiṇyā jaṭharam avakṛṣya nītavatī // ViP_4,15.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:7969: karṣaṇāc cāsāv api saṃkarṣaṇākhyām avāpa // ViP_4,15.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:7971: apy agocaro 'bjabhavapramukhair analapramukhaiś ca praṇamyāvanibhāraharaṇāya prasādito
GP12vipce_pu:7972: bhagavān anādimadhyo devakīgarbhe samavatatāra vāsudevaḥ // ViP_4,15.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:7973: tatprasādavivardhitamānābhimānā ca yoganidrā nandagopapatnyā yaśodāyā garbham adhiṣṭhitavatī // ViP_4,15.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:7974: suprasannādityacandrādigraham avyālādibhayaṃ svasthamānasam akhilam evaitaj jagad apāstādharmam abhavat tasmiṃś ca puṇḍarīkanayane jāyamāne
GP12vipce_pu:7975: jātena ca tenākhilam evaitat sanmārgavarti jagad akriyata /
GP12vipce_pu:7976: bhagavato 'py atra martyaloke 'vatīrṇasya ṣoḍaśasahasrāṇy ekottaraśatādhikāni bhāryāṇām abhavan /
GP12vipce_pu:7977: tāsāṃ ca rukmiṇīsatyabhāmājāmbavatīcāruhāsinīpramukhā hy aṣṭau patnyaḥ pradhānā /
GP12vipce_pu:7978: tāsu cāṣṭāyutāni lakṣaṃ ca putrāṇāṃ bhagavān akhilamūrtir anādimān ajanayat // ViP_4,15.19 //
GP12vipce_pu:7982: aniruddho 'pi rukmiṇa eva pautrīṃ subhadrāṃ nāmopayeme /
GP12vipce_pu:7985: evam anekaśatasāhasrapuruṣasaṃkhyasya yadukulasya puruṣasaṃkhyā varṣaśatair api jñātuṃ na śakyate // ViP_4,15.43 //
GP12vipce_pu:7986: yato hi ślokāv atra caritārthau // ViP_4,15.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:7988: kumārāṇāṃ gṛhācāryāś cāpayogyāsu ye ratāḥ // ViP_4,15.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:7993: teṣām utsādanārthāya bhuvi devā yadoḥ kule /
GP12vipce_pu:7995: viṣṇus teṣāṃ pramāṇe ca prabhutve ca vyavasthitaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7997: prasūtiṃ vṛṣṇivīrāṇāṃ yaḥ śṛṇoti naraḥ sadā /
GP12vipce_pu:7998: sa sarvaiḥ pātakair mukto viṣṇulokaṃ prapadyate // ViP_4,15.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:8001: ity eṣa samāsatas te kathito yador vaṃśaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8003: turvasor vahnir ātmajo vahner gobhānus tataś ca traiśānus tasmāc ca karaṃdhamaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8006: tataś ca pauravaṃ duṣyantaṃ putram akalpayat /
GP12vipce_pu:8007: evaṃ yayātiśāpāt tadvaṃśaḥ pauravam vaṃśaṃ samāśritavān // ViP_4,16.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:8014: tato dharmo dharmād dhṛto dhṛtād durdamaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8016: pracetasaḥ putraśatam adharmabahulānāṃ mlecchānām udīcyānām ādhipatyam akarot // ViP_4,17.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:8019: yayāteś caturthasyaputrasyānoḥ sabhānaracakṣuparamekṣusaṃjñās trayaḥ putrā babhūvuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8020: sabhānaraputraḥ kālānaraḥ kālānarāt sṛñjayaḥ sṛñjayāt puraṃjayaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8021: tasmāj janamejayas tato mahāśālas tasmāc ca mahāmanāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8022: tasmād apy uśīnaratitikṣū dvau putrāv utpannau /
GP12vipce_pu:8026: tato 'pi hemo hemāt sutapās tasmād baliḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8027: yasya kṣetre dīrghatamasā aṅgavaṅgakaliṅgasuhyapauṇḍrākhyaṃ bāleyaṃ kṣatram ajanyata // ViP_4,18.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:8029: aṅgasya tv anapānas tasyātmajo divirathas tasmād dharmarathaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8032: yasmai ajaputro daśarathaḥ śāntāṃ nāma kanyām anapatyāya duhitṛtve yuyoja // ViP_4,18.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:8034: tataś campo yaś campāṃ niveśayām āsa /
GP12vipce_pu:8035: campasya haryaṅgas tato bhadrarathas tato bṛhadrathas tato bṛhatkarmā bṛhatkarmaṇaś ca bṛhadbhānus tasmād bṛhanmanās tato jayadrathaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8036: jayadratho brahmakṣatrāntarālasaṃbhūtyāṃ patnyāṃ vijayaṃ nāma putram ajījanat // ViP_4,18.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:8040: yo 'sau gaṅgāṃ gato mañjūṣāgataṃ pṛthāpaviddhaṃ karṇaṃ putram avāpa /
GP12vipce_pu:8042: ataś ca puror vaṃśaṃ śrotum arhasīti // ViP_4,18.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:8045: pūror janamejayaḥ putras tasyāpi pracinvān pracinvataḥ pravīraḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8046: tasmān manasyur manasyoś cābhayadas tasyāpi sudyuḥ sudyor bahugavaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8047: tasyāpi saṃyātiḥ saṃyāter ahaṃyātiḥ tato raudrāśvaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8048: ṛteyuḥ kakṣeyuḥ sthaṇḍileyur dhṛteyur jaleyuḥ sthaleyur dharmeyuḥ saṃnateyur dhaneyur vaneyur nāmāno raudrāśvasya daśātmajā V putrā babhūvuḥ
GP12vipce_pu:8050: sumatim apratirathaṃ dhruvaṃ ca rantināraḥ putrān avāpa /
GP12vipce_pu:8055: duṣyantāc cakravartī bharato 'bhavat yannāmahetur devaiḥ śloko gīyate /
GP12vipce_pu:8056: mātā bhastrā pituḥ putro yena jātaḥ sa eva saḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8057: bharasva putraṃ duṣyanta māvamaṃsthāḥ śakuntalām // ViP_4,19.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:8059: tvaṃ cāsya dhātā garbhasya satyam āha śakuntalā // ViP_4,19.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:8061: naite mamānurūpā ity abhihitās tanmātaro jaghnuḥ parityāgabhayāt /
GP12vipce_pu:8062: tato 'sya vitathe putrajanmani putrārthino marutsomayājino dīrghatamasā pārṣṇyapāstabṛhaspativīryād
GP12vipce_pu:8063: utathyapatnīmamatāsamutpanno bharadvājākhyaḥ putro marudbhir dattaḥ // ViP_4,19.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:8065: mūḍhe bhara dvājam imaṃ bhara dvājaṃ bṛhaspate /
GP12vipce_pu:8066: yātau yad uktvā pitarau bharadvājas tatas tv ayam // ViP_4,19.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:8067: iti bharadvājaś ca tasya vitathe putrajanmani marudbhir dattas tato vitathasaṃjñām avāpa // ViP_4,19.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:8071: gargāc chinis tato gārgyāḥ śainyāḥ kṣatropetā dvijātayo babhūvuḥ // ViP_4,19.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:8073: tasya trayyāruṇapuṣkariṇau kapiś ca putratrayam abhūt /
GP12vipce_pu:8074: tac ca tritayam api paścād vipratām upajagāma /
GP12vipce_pu:8075: bṛhatkṣatrasya suhotraḥ suhotrād dhastī ya idaṃ hastināpuram āropayām āsa /
GP12vipce_pu:8080: tato bṛhaddhanus tataś ca bṛhatkarmā tasmāj jayadrathas tato 'pi viśvajit /
GP12vipce_pu:8088: pārāt pṛthuḥ pṛthoḥ sukṛtiḥ sukṛter vibhrājaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8089: tataś cāṇuho yaḥ śukaduhitaraṃ kṛtvīṃ nāmopayeme // ViP_4,19.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:8093: dvimīḍhasya tu yavīnarasaṃjñas tasyāpi dhṛtimāṃs tataḥ satyadhṛtis tataś ca dṛḍhanemiḥ
GP12vipce_pu:8094: tasmāc ca supārśvas tataḥ sumatis tataś ca sannatimān sannatimataḥ kṛto 'bhūt /
GP12vipce_pu:8096: yaś caturviṃśati prācyasāmagānāṃ saṃhitāś cakāra // ViP_4,19.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:8097: kṛtāc cogrāyudho yena prācuryeṇa nīpakṣayaḥ kṛtaḥ // ViP_4,19.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:8098: ugrāyudhāt kṣemyaḥ kṣemyāt suvīras tasmād ripuṃjayas tasmāc ca bahuratha ity ete pauravāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8099: ajamīḍhasya nalinī nāma patnī tasyāṃ nīlasaṃjñaḥ putro 'bhavat /
GP12vipce_pu:8100: tasmād api śāntiḥ śānteḥ suśāntiḥ suśānteḥ purujānuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8103: pañcānām eteṣāṃ viṣayāṇāṃ rakṣaṇāyālam ete matputrā iti pitrābhihitam /
GP12vipce_pu:8105: mudgalāc ca maudgalyāḥ kṣatropetā dvijātayo babhūvuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8106: mudgalād vadhyaśvo vadhyaśvād divodāso 'halyā ca mithunam abhūt /
GP12vipce_pu:8109: satyadhṛtes tu varāpsarasam urvaśīṃ dṛṣṭvā retaḥ skannaṃ śarastambe papāta // ViP_4,19.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:8110: tac ca dvidhā gatam apatyadvayaṃ kumāraḥ kanyakā cābhavat /
GP12vipce_pu:8111: mṛgayām upagataḥ śāntanur dṛṣṭvā kṛpayā jagrāha // ViP_4,19.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:8112: tataḥ sa kumāraḥ kṛpaḥ kanyā cāśvatthāmno jananī kṛpī droṇasya patny abhavat /
GP12vipce_pu:8113: divodāsasyāpi mitrāyuḥ putro mitrāyoś cyavano nāma rājā cyavanāt sudāsaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8116: teṣāṃ yavīyān pṛṣataḥ pṛṣatād drupadas tasmād dhṛṣṭadyumnas tato dhṛṣṭaketuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8119: ya idaṃ dharmakṣetraṃ kurukṣetraṃ cakāra // ViP_4,19.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:8125: bṛhadrathāt kuśāgras tasmād ṛṣabhas tataḥ puṣpavān /
GP12vipce_pu:8126: tasmāt satyahitas tasmāt sudhanvā tasya ca jantuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8127: bṛhadrathāc cānyaḥ śakaladvayajanmā jarayā saṃdhito jarāsaṃdhanāmā /
GP12vipce_pu:8128: tasmāt sahadevas tataḥ somapis tataḥ śrutaśravāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8133: jahnos tu suratho nāmātmajo babhūva // ViP_4,20.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:8135: vidūrathasya sārvabhaumaḥ sārvabhaumāj jayatsenas tasmād ārādhitas tataś cāyutāyur ayutāyor akrodhanaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8143: ayaṃ ca tasya ślokaḥ pṛthivyāṃ gīyate /
GP12vipce_pu:8144: yaṃ yaṃ karābhyāṃ spṛśati jīrṇaṃ yauvanam eti saḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8145: śāntiṃ cāpnoti yenāgryāṃ karmaṇā tena śāṃtanuḥ // ViP_4,20.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:8146: tasya śāṃtano rāṣṭre dvādaśavarṣāṇi devo na vavarṣa // ViP_4,20.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:8147: tataś cāśeṣarāṣṭravināśam avekṣyāsau rājā brāhmaṇān apṛcchat /
GP12vipce_pu:8148: kasmād asmadrāṣṭre devo na varṣati ko mamāparādha iti /
GP12vipce_pu:8150: agrajasya te 'rheyam avanis tvayā bhujyate parivettā tvam ity uktaḥ sa punas tān apṛcchat /
GP12vipce_pu:8153: yāvad devāpir na patanādibhir doṣair abhibhūyate tāvat tasyārhaṃ rājyam /
GP12vipce_pu:8154: tad alam etena tasmai dīyatām ity ukte tasya mantripravareṇāśmasāriṇātatrāraṇye tapasvino vedavādavirodhavaktāraḥ prayuktāḥ // ViP_4,20.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:8155: tair asyātiṛjumater mahīpatiputrasya buddhir vedavirodhamārgānusāriṇy akriyata // ViP_4,20.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:8156: rājā ca śāṃtanur dvijavacanotpannaparivedanaśokas tān brāhmaṇān agraṇīkṛtyāgrajarājyapradānāyāraṇyaṃ jagāma /
GP12vipce_pu:8157: tadāśramam upagatāś ca tam avanīpatiputraṃ devāpim upatasthuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8158: te brāhmaṇā vedavādānubaddhāni vacāṃsi rājyam agrajena kartavyam ity arthavanti tam ūcuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8159: asāv api devāpir vedavādavirodhiyuktidūṣitam anekaprakāraṃ tān āha /
GP12vipce_pu:8161: āgaccha bho rājann alam atrātinirbandhena praśānta evāsāv anāvṛṣṭidoṣaḥ patito 'yam anādikālam ahitavedavacanadūṣaṇoccāraṇāt /
GP12vipce_pu:8162: patite cāgraje naiva pārivedyaṃ bhavatīty uktaḥ śāṃtanuḥ svapuram āgatya rājyam akarot /
GP12vipce_pu:8163: vedavādavirodhivacanoccāraṇadūṣite ca tasmin devāpāv akhilasya niṣpattaye vavarṣa bhagavān parjanyaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8166: śāṃtanor apy amaranadyāṃ gaṅgāyām udārakīrtir aśeṣaśāstrārthavid bhīṣmaḥ putro 'bhūt /
GP12vipce_pu:8167: satyavatyāṃ ca citrāṅgadavicitravīryau putrāv utpādayām āsa śāṃtanuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8168: citrāṅgadas tu bāla eva citrāṅgadena gandharveṇāhave vinihataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8170: tadupabhogātikhedāc ca yakṣmaṇā gṛhītaḥ pañcatvam agamat /
GP12vipce_pu:8171: satyavatīniyogāc ca tatputraḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyano mātur vacanam anatikramaṇīyam iti vicitravīryakṣetre dhṛtarāṣṭrapāṇḍū tatprahitabhujiṣyāyāṃ ca viduraṃ utpādayām āsa // ViP_4,20.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:8173: pāṇḍor apy araṇye mṛgaśāpopahataprajananasāmarthyasya dharmavāyuśakrair yudhiṣṭhirabhīmārjunāḥ kuntyāṃ nakulasahadevau cāśvibhyāṃ mādryāṃ pañca putrāḥ samutpāditāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8174: teṣāṃ ca draupadyāṃ pañca putrā babhūvuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8175: yudhiṣṭhirāt prativindhyo bhīmasenāc chrutasomaḥ śrutakīrtir arjunāc chatānīko nakulāc chrutakarmā sahadevāt /
GP12vipce_pu:8176: apare ca pāṇḍavānām ātmajās tad yathā /
GP12vipce_pu:8179: kāśī ca bhīmasenād eva sarvatragaṃ putram avāpa /
GP12vipce_pu:8180: sahadevāc ca vijayā suhotraṃ nāma putraṃ prāptavatī /
GP12vipce_pu:8181: kareṇumatyāṃ ca nakulo 'pi niramitram ajījanat // ViP_4,20.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:8182: arjunasyāpy ulūpyāṃ nāgakanyāyām irāvān nāma putro 'bhūt /
GP12vipce_pu:8183: maṇipurapatiputryāṃ ca putrikādharmeṇa babhruvāhanaṃ nāma putram arjuno 'janayat // ViP_4,20.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:8184: subhadrāyāṃ cārbhakatve 'pi yo 'sāv atibalaparākramasamastārātirathavijetā so 'bhimanyur ajāyata /
GP12vipce_pu:8185: abhimanyor uttarāyāṃ parikṣīṇeṣu kuruṣv aśvatthāmaprayuktabrahmāstreṇa garbha eva
GP12vipce_pu:8188: yo 'yaṃ sāmpratam etad bhūmaṇḍalam akhaṇḍitāyatidharmeṇa pālayati/420.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:8191: ataḥ paraṃ bhaviṣyān ahaṃ bhūpālān kīrtayiṣyāmi /
GP12vipce_pu:8192: yo 'yaṃ sāmpratam avanīpatiḥ parīkṣit tasyāpi janamejayaśrutasenograsenabhīmasenāḥ putrāś catvāro bhaviṣyanti // ViP_4,21.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:8194: yo 'sau yājñavalkyād vedam adhītya kṛpād astrāṇy avāpya viṣayaviraktacittavṛttiś ca śaunakopadeśād ātmavijñānapravīṇaḥ paraṃ nirvāṇam āpsyati
GP12vipce_pu:8199: uṣṇāc citrarathas tataḥ śucirathas tasmād vṛṣṇimāṃs tataḥ suṣeṇaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8200: tasmād api sunīthaḥ sunīthād ṛcas tato nṛcakṣus tasyāpi sukhibalas tasmād pariplavas tataś ca sunayas tato medhāvī /
GP12vipce_pu:8201: tato n.paṃjayas tato mṛdus tasmāt tigmas tigmād bṛhadrathaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8203: tasmāc codayana udayanād ahīnaras tataś ca daṇḍapāṇis tato niramitras tasmāc ca kṣemakaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8206: kṣemakaṃ prāpya rājānaṃ sa saṃsthāṃ prāpsyate kalau // ViP_4,21.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:8211: tasmād urukṣayas tato vatso vatsād vatsavyūhaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8212: tataḥ prativyomas tasyāpi divākaras tasmāt sahadevaḥ // ViP_4,22.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:8213: tato bṛhadaśvas tatsūnur bhānurathas tasya pratītāśvas tasyāpi supratīkaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8214: tato marudevo marudevāt sunakṣatras tasmāt kiṃnaraḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8215: kiṃnara-d antarikṣas tasmāt suvarṇas tataś cāmitrajit /
GP12vipce_pu:8216: tataś ca bṛhadrājas tasyāpi dharmī dharmiṇaḥ kṛtaṃjayaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8217: kṛtaṃjayād raṇaṃjayo raṇaṃjayāt saṃjayas tasmāc chākyaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8218: śākyāc chuddhodanas tasmād rāhulas tataḥ prasenajit /
GP12vipce_pu:8219: tataś ca kṣudrakas tataś ca kuṇḍakas tasmād api surathaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8220: tatputraś ca sumitro 'ntya ity ete cekṣvākavo bṛhadbalānvayāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8223: yatas taṃ prāpya rājānaṃ sa saṃsthāṃ prāpsyate kalau // ViP_4,22.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:8227: atra hi vaṃśe mahābalā jarāsaṃdhapradhānā babhūvuḥ // ViP_4,23.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:8228: jarāsaṃdhasutāt sahadevāt somāpis tasmāc chṛtavāṃs tasyāpy ayutāyus tataś ca niramitras tattanayaḥ sukṣatras tasmād api bṛhatkarmā /
GP12vipce_pu:8229: tataś ca senajit tasmāc ca śrutaṃjayas tato vipras tasya putraḥ śucināmā bhaviṣyati /
GP12vipce_pu:8230: tasyāpi kṣemyas tataś ca suvrataḥ suvratād dharmas tataḥ suśramaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8231: tato dṛḍhasenas tataḥ sumatis tasmāt subalas tasya sunīto bhavitā /
GP12vipce_pu:8232: tataḥ satyajit satyajito viśvajit tasyāpi ripuṃjayaḥ putraḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8233: ity ete bārhadrathā bhūpatayo varṣasahasram ekaṃ bhaviṣyantīti // ViP_4,23.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:8236: yo 'yaṃ ripuṃjayo nāma bārhadratho 'ntyas tasya muniko nāmāmātyo bhaviṣyati /
GP12vipce_pu:8237: sa cainaṃ svāminaṃ hatvā svaputraṃ pradyotanāmānam abhiṣekṣyati /
GP12vipce_pu:8239: tataś ca viśākhayūpas tatputro janakas tasya ca nandivardhanaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8240: ity ete 'ṣṭatriṃśaduttaram abdaśataṃ pañca pradyotāḥ pṛthivīṃ bhokṣyanti // ViP_4,24.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:8241: tataś ca śiśunāgas tatputraś ca kākavarṇo bhavitā /
GP12vipce_pu:8246: ity ete śaiśunāgā daśa bhūmipālās trīṇi varṣaśatāni dviṣaṣṭyadhikāni bhaviṣyanti // ViP_4,24.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:8247: mahānandisutaḥ śūdrāgarbhodbhavo 'tilubdho mahāpadmo nandaḥ paraśurāma ivāparo 'khilakṣatrāntakārī bhavitā // ViP_4,24.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:8249: sa caikacchatrām anullaṅghitaśāsano mahāpadmaḥ pṛthivīṃ bhokṣyati // ViP_4,24.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:8252: mahāpadmas tatputrāś ca ekaṃ varṣaśatam avanīpatayo bhaviṣyanti /
GP12vipce_pu:8253: navaitān nandān kauṭilyo brāhmaṇaḥ samuddhariṣyati // ViP_4,24.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:8257: tasyāpy aśokavardhanas tataḥ suyaśās tato daśarathas tataḥ saṃgatas tataḥ śāliśūkas tasmāt somaśarmā tasmāc chatadhanvā /
GP12vipce_pu:8259: evaṃ mauryā daśa bhūpatayo bhaviṣyanti abdaśataṃ saptatriṃśaduttaram /
GP12vipce_pu:8260: teṣām ante pṛthivīṃ śuṅgā bhokṣyanti // ViP_4,24.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:8261: puṣyamitraḥ senāpatiḥ svāminaṃ hatvā rājyaṃ kariṣyati // ViP_4,24.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:8262: asyātmajo 'gnimitras tasmāt sujyeṣṭhas tato vasumitras tasmād apy ardrakas tataḥ pulindakas tato ghoṣavasus tasmād api vajramitras tato bhāgavataḥ
GP12vipce_pu:8264: ity ete daśa śuṅgā dvādaśottaraṃ varṣaśataṃ pṛthivīṃ bhokṣyanti /
GP12vipce_pu:8265: tataḥ kaṇvān eṣā bhūr yāsyati // ViP_4,24.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:8266: devabhūtiṃ tu śuṅgarājānaṃ vyasaninaṃ tasyaivāmātyaḥ kaṇvo vasudevanāmā nipātya svayam avanīṃ bhokṣyate /
GP12vipce_pu:8269: ete kāṇvāyanāś catvāraḥ pañcacatvāriṃśad varṣāṇi bhūpatayo bhaviṣyanti /
GP12vipce_pu:8270: suśarmāṇaṃ tu kāṇvaṃ svabhṛtyo balāt śiprakanāmā hatvāndhrajātīyo vasudhāṃ bhokṣyati /
GP12vipce_pu:8271: tataś ca kṛṣṇanāmā tadbhrātā bhūpatir bhāvī /
GP12vipce_pu:8272: tasya putraḥ śrīśātakarṇis tasyāpi pūrṇotsaṅgas tatputraś ca śātakarṇis tasmāc ca lambodaras tasmād divīlakas tato meghasvātis tataḥ paṭumān
GP12vipce_pu:8273: tataś cāriṣṭakarmā tato hālo hālāt pattalakas tataḥ pravilla senas tataḥ sundaraḥ śātakarṇī tasmāc cakoraḥ śātakarṇī tataḥ śivasvātis tataś ca gomatīputras tatputraḥ pulimān /
GP12vipce_pu:8274: tasyāpi śātakarṇī tataḥ śivaśrīs tataḥ śivaskandhaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8275: tasmād yajñaśrīs tato vijayas tataś candraśrīs tasyāpi pulomāviḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8276: evam ete triṃśac catvāry abdaśatāni ṣaṭpañcāśadadhikāni pṛthivīṃ bhokṣyanty āndhrabhṛtyāḥ // ViP_4,24.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:8277: saptābhīrāḥ daśa gardabhilāś ca bhūbhujo bhaviṣyanti /
GP12vipce_pu:8279: tataś cāṣṭau yavanāś caturdaśa tuṣārā muṇḍāś ca trayodaśa ekādaśa maunāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8280: ete pṛthivīṃ trayodaśavarṣaśatāni navanavatyadhikāni bhokṣyanti // ViP_4,24.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:8281: tataś ca paurā ekādaśa bhūpatayo 'bdaśatāni trīṇi mahīṃ bhokṣyanti /
GP12vipce_pu:8282: teṣūtsanneṣu kailakilā yavanā bhūpatayo bhaviṣyanty amūrdhābhiṣiktāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8284: tataḥ puraṃjayas tato rāmacandras tasmād dharmo dharmād vaṅgaraḥ kṛtanandanaḥ suṣinandis tadbhrātā nandiyaśāḥ śiśukapravīrau caite varṣaśataṃ ṣaḍ varṣāṇi ca bhaviṣyanti /
GP12vipce_pu:8285: tatas tatputrās trayodaśaite bāhlikāś ca trayaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8286: tataḥ puṣyamitrapaṭumitrās trayodaśa mekalāś ca saptāndhrāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8292: nava nāgāḥ padmāvatyāṃ nāma puryāṃ mathurāyām anugaṅgāprayāgaṃ māgadhā guptāś ca bhokṣyanti /
GP12vipce_pu:8297: saurāṣṭrāvantiśūdrān arbudamarubhūmiviṣayāṃś ca vrātyā dvijābhīraśūdrādyā bhokṣyanti /
GP12vipce_pu:8299: ete ca tulyakālāḥ sarve pṛthivyāṃ bhūbhṛto bhaviṣyanti /
GP12vipce_pu:8300: alpaprasādā bṛhatkopāḥ sarvakālam anṛtādharmarucayaḥ strībālagovadhakartāraḥ parasvādānarucayo
GP12vipce_pu:8301: 'lpasārā uditāstamitaprāyāḥ svalpāyuṣo mahecchā hy alpadharmāś ca bhaviṣyanti // ViP_4,24.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:8302: taiś ca vimiśrā janapadās tacchīlavartino rājāśrayaśuṣmiṇo mlecchācāryāś ca viparyayeṇa vartamānāḥ prajāḥ kṣapayiṣyanti /
GP12vipce_pu:8303: tataś cānudinam alpālpahrāsavyavacchedād dharmārthayor jagataḥ saṃkṣayo bhaviṣyati // ViP_4,24.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:8321: ity evam anekadoṣottare bhūmaṇḍale sarvavarṇeṣv eva yo yo balavān sa sa bhūpatir bhaviṣyati /
GP12vipce_pu:8322: evaṃ cātilubdhakarabhārāsahāḥ śailānām antaradroṇīḥ prajāḥ saṃśrayiṣyanti /
GP12vipce_pu:8325: na ca kaścit trayoviṃśativarṣāṇi jīviṣyati anavarataṃ cātra kaliyuge kṣayam āyāty akhila evaiṣa janaḥ kṣayam upaiṣyati // ViP_4,24.19 //
GP12vipce_pu:8326: śrautasmārtadharme viplavam atyantam upagate kṣīṇaprāye ca kalāv aśeṣajagatsraṣṭuś
GP12vipce_pu:8329: kalkirūpī jagaty atrāvatīrya sakalamlecchadasyuduṣṭācaraṇacetasām aśeṣāṇām aparicchinnamāhātmyaśaktiḥ kṣayaṃ kariṣyati /
GP12vipce_pu:8331: anantaraṃ cāśeṣakaler avasāne niśāvasānaprabuddhānāṃ teṣām eva janapadānām amalasphaṭikaviśuddhā matayo bhaviṣyanti // ViP_4,24.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:8332: teṣāṃ ca bījabhūtānām aśeṣamanuṣyāṇāṃ pariṇatānām api tatkālakṛtānām apatyaprasūtir bhaviṣyati /
GP12vipce_pu:8333: tāni ca tadapatyāni kṛtayugadharmānusārīṇy eva bhaviṣyantīti // ViP_4,24.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:8335: yadā candraś ca sūryaś ca yadā tiṣyabṛhaspatī /
GP12vipce_pu:8336: ekarāśau sameṣyanti bhaviṣyati tadā kṛtam // ViP_4,24.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:8337: atītā vartamānāś ca tathaivānāgatāś ca ye /
GP12vipce_pu:8338: ete vaṃśeṣu bhūpālāḥ kathitā munisattama // ViP_4,24.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:8340: etad varṣasahasraṃ tu jñeyaṃ pañcadaśottaram // ViP_4,24.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:8341: saptarṣīṇāṃ tu yau pūrvau dṛśyete uditau divi /
GP12vipce_pu:8342: tayos tu madhye nakṣatraṃ dṛśyate yat samaṃ niśi /
GP12vipce_pu:8343: tena saptarṣayo yuktās tiṣṭhanty abdaśataṃ nṛṇām // ViP_4,24.25 //
GP12vipce_pu:8344: te tu pārīkṣite kāle maghāsv āsan dvijottama /
GP12vipce_pu:8345: tadā pravṛttaś ca kalir dvādaśābdaśatātmakaḥ // ViP_4,24.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:8346: yadaiva bhagavadviṣṇor aṃśo yāto divaṃ dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:8349: tāvat pṛthvīpariṣvaṅge samartho nābhavat kaliḥ // ViP_4,24.28 //
GP12vipce_pu:8350: gate sanātanasyāṃśe viṣṇos tatra bhuvo divam /
GP12vipce_pu:8351: tatyāja sānujo rājyaṃ dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ // ViP_4,24.29 //
GP12vipce_pu:8352: viparītāni dṛṣṭvā ca nimittāni sa pāṇḍavaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8353: yāte kṛṣṇe cakārātha so 'bhiṣekaṃ parīkṣitaḥ // ViP_4,24.30 //
GP12vipce_pu:8355: tadā nandāt prabhṛty eṣa kalir vṛddhiṃ gamiṣyati // ViP_4,24.31 //
GP12vipce_pu:8356: yasmin kṛṣṇo divaṃ yātas tasminn eva tadāhani /
GP12vipce_pu:8357: pratipannaṃ kaliyugaṃ tasya saṃkhyāṃ nibodha me // ViP_4,24.32 //
GP12vipce_pu:8359: ṣaṣṭiṃ caiva sahasrāṇi bhaviṣyaty eṣa vai kaliḥ // ViP_4,24.33 //
GP12vipce_pu:8360: śatāni tāni divyāni sapta pañca ca saṃkhyayā /
GP12vipce_pu:8361: niḥśeṣeṇa tatas tasmin bhaviṣyati punaḥ kṛtam // ViP_4,24.34 //
GP12vipce_pu:8362: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ca dvijasattama /
GP12vipce_pu:8363: yuge yuge mahātmānaḥ samatītāḥ sahasraśaḥ // ViP_4,24.35 //
GP12vipce_pu:8365: punaruktabahutvāt tu na mayā parikīrtitā // ViP_4,24.36 //
GP12vipce_pu:8368: kṛte yuga ihāgatya kṣatraprāvartakau hi tau /
GP12vipce_pu:8372: kalau tu bījabhūtās te kecit tiṣṭhanti bhūtale /
GP12vipce_pu:8374: eṣa tūddeśato vaṃśas tavokto bhūbhujāṃ mayā /
GP12vipce_pu:8375: nikhilo gadituṃ śakyo naiva janmaśatair api // ViP_4,24.41 //
GP12vipce_pu:8376: ete cānye ca bhūpālā yair atra kṣitimaṇḍale /
GP12vipce_pu:8378: kathaṃ mameyam acalā matputrasya kathaṃ mahī /
GP12vipce_pu:8379: madvaṃśasyeti cintārtā jagmur antam ime nṛpāḥ // ViP_4,24.43 //
GP12vipce_pu:8380: tebhyaḥ pūrvatarāś cānye tebhyas tebhyas tathāpare /
GP12vipce_pu:8381: bhaviṣyāś caiva yāsyanti teṣām anye ca ye 'dhy anu // ViP_4,24.44 //
GP12vipce_pu:8384: maitreya pṛthivīgītāḥ ślokāś cātra nibodha tān /
GP12vipce_pu:8385: yān āha dharmadhvajine janakāyāsito muniḥ // ViP_4,24.46 //
GP12vipce_pu:8387: katham eṣa narendrāṇāṃ moho buddhimatām api /
GP12vipce_pu:8389: pūrvam ātmajayaṃ kṛtvā jetum icchanti mantriṇaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8390: tato bhṛtyāṃś ca paurāṃś ca jigīṣante tathā ripūn // ViP_4,24.48 //
GP12vipce_pu:8392: ity āsaktadhiyo mṛtyuṃ na paśyanty avidūragam // ViP_4,24.49 //
GP12vipce_pu:8394: kiyad ātmajayād etan muktir ātmajaye phalam // ViP_4,24.50 //
GP12vipce_pu:8395: utsṛjya pūrvajā yātā yāṃ nādāya gataḥ pitā /
GP12vipce_pu:8396: tāṃ mameti vimūḍhatvāj jetum icchanti pārthivāḥ // ViP_4,24.51 //
GP12vipce_pu:8399: pṛthvī mameyaṃ sakalā mameyaṃ madanvayasyāpi ca śāśvateyam /
GP12vipce_pu:8400: yo yo mṛto hy atra babhūva rājā kubuddhir āsīd iti tasya tasya // ViP_4,24.53 //
GP12vipce_pu:8401: dṛṣṭvā mamatvādṛtacittam ekaṃ vihāya māṃ mṛtyupathaṃ vrajantam /
GP12vipce_pu:8402: tasyānvayasthasya kathaṃ mamatvaṃ hṛdy āspadaṃ matprabhavaṃ karoti // ViP_4,24.54 //
GP12vipce_pu:8403: pṛthvī mamaiṣāśu parityajaināṃ vadanti ye dūtamukhaiḥ svaśatrum /
GP12vipce_pu:8404: narādhipās teṣu mamātihāsaḥ punaś ca mūḍheṣu dayābhyupaiti // ViP_4,24.55 //
GP12vipce_pu:8406: ity ete dharaṇīgītāḥ ślokā maitreya yaiḥ śrutaiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8407: mamatvaṃ vilayaṃ yāti tāpanyastaṃ yathā himam // ViP_4,24.56 //
GP12vipce_pu:8408: ity eṣa kathitaḥ samyaṅ manor vaṃśo mayā tava /
GP12vipce_pu:8409: yatra sthitipravṛttasya viṣṇor aṃśāṃśakā nṛpāḥ // ViP_4,24.57 //
GP12vipce_pu:8410: śṛṇoti ya imaṃ bhaktyā manor vaṃśam anukramāt /
GP12vipce_pu:8411: tasya pāpam aśeṣaṃ vai praṇaśyaty amalātmanaḥ // ViP_4,24.58 //
GP12vipce_pu:8417: kṛtān kālena balinā kathāśeṣān narādhipān // ViP_4,24.61 //
GP12vipce_pu:8419: dravyādau vā kṛtaprajño mamatvaṃ kurute naraḥ // ViP_4,24.62 //
GP12vipce_pu:8420: taptaṃ tapo yaiḥ puruṣapravīrair udbāhubhir varṣagaṇān anekān /
GP12vipce_pu:8421: iṣṭāś ca yajñā balino 'tivīryāḥ kṛtās tu kālena kathāvaśeṣāḥ // ViP_4,24.63 //
GP12vipce_pu:8422: pṛthuḥ samastān pracacāra lokān avyāhato yo 'rividāricakraḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8423: sa kālavātābhihato vinaṣṭaḥ kṣiptaṃ yathā śālmalitūlam agnau // ViP_4,24.64 //
GP12vipce_pu:8424: yaḥ kārtavīryo bubhuje samastān dvīpān samākramya hatāricakraḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8425: kathāprasaṅgeṣv abhidhīyamānaḥ sa eva saṃkalpavikalpahetuḥ // ViP_4,24.65 //
GP12vipce_pu:8427: bhasmāpi jātaṃ na kathaṃ kṣaṇena bhrūbhaṅgapātena dhig antakasya // ViP_4,24.66 //
GP12vipce_pu:8428: kathāśarīratvam avāpa yad vai māndhātṛnāmā bhuvi cakravartī /
GP12vipce_pu:8429: śrutvāpi taṃ ko hi karoti sādhur mamatvam ātmany api mandacetāḥ // ViP_4,24.67 //
GP12vipce_pu:8430: bhagīrathādyāḥ sagaraḥ kakutstho daśānano rāghavalakṣmaṇau ca /
GP12vipce_pu:8431: yudhiṣṭhirādyāś ca babhūvur ete satyaṃ na mithyā kva nu te na vidmaḥ // ViP_4,24.68 //
GP12vipce_pu:8432: ye sāmprataṃ ye ca nṛpā bhaviṣyāḥ proktā mayā vipravarogravīryāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8433: ye te tathānye ca tathābhidheyāḥ sarve bhaviṣyanti yathaiva pūrve // ViP_4,24.69 //
GP12vipce_pu:8434: etad viditvā na nareṇa kāryaṃ mamatvam ātmany api paṇḍitena /
GP12vipce_pu:8435: tiṣṭhantu tāvat tanayātmajāyāḥ kṣetrādayo ye tu śarīrato 'nye // ViP_4,24.70 //
GP12vipce_pu:8443: viṣṇos taṃ vistareṇāhaṃ śrotum icchāmy aśeṣataḥ // ViP_5,1.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:8445: aṃśāṃśenāvatīryorvyāṃ tatra tāni mune vada // ViP_5,1.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:8447: maitreya śrūyatām etad yat pṛṣṭo 'ham iha tvayā /
GP12vipce_pu:8451: kaṃsas tayor vararathaṃ codayām āsa sārathiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8453: athāntarikṣe vāg uccaiḥ kaṃsam ābhāṣya sādaram /
GP12vipce_pu:8455: yām enāṃ vahase mūḍha saha bhartrā rathe sthitām /
GP12vipce_pu:8456: asyās tavāṣṭamo garbhaḥ prāṇān apahariṣyati // ViP_5,1.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:8458: ity ākarṇya samādāya khaḍgaṃ kaṃso mahābalaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8459: devakīṃ hantum ārabdho vasudevo 'bravīd idam // ViP_5,1.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:8460: na hantavyā mahābhāga devakī bhavatā tava /
GP12vipce_pu:8463: tathety āha ca taṃ kaṃso vasudevaṃ dvijottama /
GP12vipce_pu:8464: na ghātayām āsa ca tāṃ devakīṃ tasya gauravāt // ViP_5,1.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:8466: jagāma dharaṇī merau samāje tridivaukasām // ViP_5,1.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:8468: kathayām āsa tat sarvaṃ khedāt karuṇabhāṣiṇī // ViP_5,1.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:8470: agniḥ suvarṇasya gurur gavāṃ sūryaḥ paro guruḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8471: mamāpy akhilalokānāṃ gurur nārāyaṇo guruḥ // ViP_5,1.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:8474: tadaṃśabhūtaḥ sarveṣāṃ samūho vaḥ surottamāḥ // ViP_5,1.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:8476: pitaro ye ca lokānāṃ sraṣṭāro 'tripurogamāḥ // ViP_5,1.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:8477: etat tasyāprameyasya rūpaṃ viṣṇor mahātmanaḥ // ViP_5,1.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:8479: gandharvāpsarasaś caiva rūpaṃ viṣṇor mahātmanaḥ // ViP_5,1.19 //

GP12vipce_pu:9488: jānāmi bhārate vaṃśe jātaṃ pārthaṃ tavāṃśakam /

GP12vipce_pu:9490: yāvan mahītale śakra sthāsyāmy aham ariṃdama /

GP12vipce_pu:9495: tatra viddhi sahasrākṣa bhārāvataraṇaṃ kṛtam // ViP_5,12.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:9496: sa tvaṃ gaccha na saṃtāpaṃ putrārthe kartum arhasi /
GP12vipce_pu:9497: nārjunasya ripuḥ kaścin mamāgre prabhaviṣyati // ViP_5,12.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:9499: nivṛtte bhārate yuddhe kuntyai dāsyāmy avikṣatān // ViP_5,12.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:9502: āruhyairāvataṃ nāgaṃ punar eva divaṃ yayau // ViP_5,12.25 //
GP12vipce_pu:9503: kṛṣṇo 'pi sahito gobhir gopālaiś ca punar vrajam /
GP12vipce_pu:9507: gate śakre tu gopālāḥ kṛṣṇam akliṣṭakāriṇam /
GP12vipce_pu:9508: ūcuḥ prītyā dhṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā tena govardhanācalam // ViP_5,13.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:9509: vayam asmān mahābhāga bhavatā mahato bhayāt /

GP12vipce_pu:9512: divyaṃ ca karma bhavataḥ kim etat tāta kathyatām // ViP_5,13.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:9514: dhṛto govardhanaś cāyaṃ śaṅkitāni manāṃsi naḥ // ViP_5,13.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:9516: yathā tvadvīryam ālokya na tvāṃ manyāmahe naram // ViP_5,13.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:9518: karma cedam aśakyaṃ yat samastais tridaśair api // ViP_5,13.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:9519: bālatvaṃ cātivīryaṃ ca janma cāsmāsu śobhanam /
GP12vipce_pu:9520: cintyamānam ameyātmañ śaṅkāṃ kṛṣṇa prayacchati // ViP_5,13.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:9521: devo vā dānavo vā tvaṃ yakṣo gandharva eva vā /
GP12vipce_pu:9522: kiṃ vāsmākaṃ vicāreṇa bāndhavo 'si namo 'stu te // ViP_5,13.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:9524: prāyeṇa tvaṃ mahābāho harir vā rudra eva vā // ViP_5,13.8*17:1 //
GP12vipce_pu:9525: brahmā sendro yamo vāpi varuṇo vā kuberakaḥ // ViP_5,13.8*17:2 //
GP12vipce_pu:9526: anyo vā sarvadevānāṃ nātha x ta bhuvo bhavaḥ // ViP_5,13.8*17:3 //
GP12vipce_pu:9527: namo 'stu te devadeva yad asmākaṃ hitaṃ tathā // ViP_5,13.8*17:4 //
GP12vipce_pu:9529: kṣaṇaṃ bhūtvā tv asau tūṣṇīṃ kiṃcit praṇayakopavān /

GP12vipce_pu:9532: matsaṃbandhena vo gopā yadi lajjā na jāyate /

GP12vipce_pu:9534: yadi vo 'sti mayi prītiḥ ślāghyo 'haṃ bhavatāṃ yadi /

GP12vipce_pu:9536: nāhaṃ devo na gandharvo na yakṣo na ca dānavaḥ /

GP12vipce_pu:9539: iti śrutvā harer vākyaṃ baddhamaunās tato vanam /

GP12vipce_pu:9549: śanaiḥ śanair jagau gopī kācit tasya layānugam /

GP12vipce_pu:9551: kācit kṛṣṇeti kṛṣṇeti proktvā lajjām upāyayau /

GP12vipce_pu:9553: kācid āvasathasyāntaḥ sthitvā dṛṣṭvā bahir gurum /

GP12vipce_pu:9564: kṛṣṇe nibaddhahṛdayā idam ūcuḥ parasparam // ViP_5,13.24*18 //
GP12vipce_pu:9565: kṛṣṇo 'ham etat lalitaṃ vrajāmy ālokyatāṃ gatiḥ /

GP12vipce_pu:9568: nihatā pūtanā tadvac śakaṭaṃ parivartitam // ViP_5,13.25*19:1 //
GP12vipce_pu:9569: sakhyaḥ paśyata kṛṣṇasya mama vikramam adbhutam // ViP_5,13.25*19:2 //

GP12vipce_pu:9593: atropaviśya sā tena kāpi puṣpair alaṃkṛtā /

GP12vipce_pu:9598: yā gantavye drutaṃ yāti nimnapādāgrasaṃsthitiḥ // ViP_5,13.36 //
GP12vipce_pu:9602: nairāśyān mandagāminyā nivṛttaṃ lakṣyate padam // ViP_5,13.38 //

GP12vipce_pu:9605: praviṣṭo gahanaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ padam atra na lakṣyate /

GP12vipce_pu:9608: yamunātīram āgamya jagus taccaritaṃ tadā // ViP_5,13.41 //
GP12vipce_pu:9612: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇeti kṛṣṇeti prāha nānyad udīrayat // ViP_5,13.43 //
GP12vipce_pu:9615: sarvātmānaṃ tam abhajad govindaṃ viṣṇum avyayam // ViP_5,13.43*22:2 //

GP12vipce_pu:9633: dadau bāhulatāṃ skandhe gopī madhunighātinaḥ // ViP_5,13.52 //
GP12vipce_pu:9639: sādhu kṛṣṇeti kṛṣṇeti tāvat tā dviguṇaṃ jaguḥ // ViP_5,13.55 //

GP12vipce_pu:9649: ātmasvarūparūpo 'sau vyāpya vāyur iva sthitaḥ // ViP_5,13.60 //
GP12vipce_pu:9651: vāyuś cātmā tathaivāsau vyāpya sarvam avasthitaḥ // ViP_5,13.61 //

GP12vipce_pu:9663: pātayan sa gavāṃ garbhān daityo vṛṣabharūpadhṛk // ViP_5,14.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:9664: sūdayaṃs tāpasān ugro vanāny aṭati yaḥ sadā // ViP_5,14.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:9666: gopā gopastriyaś caiva kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇeti cukruśuḥ // ViP_5,14.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:9667: siṃhanādaṃ tataś cakre talaśabdaṃ ca keśavaḥ /

GP12vipce_pu:9676: apīḍayad ariṣṭasya kaṇṭhaṃ klinnam ivāmbaram // ViP_5,14.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:9677: utpāṭya śṛṅgam ekaṃ tu tenaivātāḍayat tataḥ /

GP12vipce_pu:9679: tuṣṭuvur nihate tasmin daitye gopā janārdanam /
GP12vipce_pu:9680: jambhe hate sahasrākṣaṃ purā devagaṇā yathā // ViP_5,14.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:9684: pralambe nidhanaṃ nīte dhṛte govardhanācale // ViP_5,15.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:9686: hatāyāṃ pūtanāyāṃ ca śakaṭe parivartite // ViP_5,15.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:9689: śrutvā tat sakalaṃ kaṃso nāradād devadarśanāt /

GP12vipce_pu:9692: jagarha yādavāṃś caiva kāryaṃ caitad acintayat // ViP_5,15.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:9693: yāvan na balam ārūḍhau rāmakṛṣṇau subālakau /
GP12vipce_pu:9694: tāvad eva mayā vadhyāv asādhyau rūḍhayauvanau // ViP_5,15.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:9698: tathā tathā yatiṣyāmi yāsyete saṃkṣayaṃ yathā // ViP_5,15.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:9702: tatraivāsāv atibalas tāv ubhau ghātayiṣyati // ViP_5,15.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:9704: ghātayiṣyati vā gopau vasudevasutāv ubhau // ViP_5,15.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:9706: ity ālocya sa duṣṭātmā kaṃso rāmajanārdanau /
GP12vipce_pu:9707: hantuṃ kṛtamatir vīram akrūraṃ vākyam abravīt // ViP_5,15.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:9709: bho bho dānapate vākyaṃ kriyatāṃ prītaye mama /
GP12vipce_pu:9710: itaḥ syandanam āruhya gamyatāṃ nandagokulam // ViP_5,15.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:9712: nāśāya kila saṃbhūtau mama duṣṭau pravardhataḥ // ViP_5,15.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:9714: āneyau bhavatā gatvā mallayuddhāya tāv ubhau // ViP_5,15.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:9716: tābhyāṃ sahānayor yuddhaṃ sarvaloko 'tra paśyatu // ViP_5,15.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:9718: sa vā haniṣyate pāpau vasudevātmajau śiśū // ViP_5,15.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:9719: tau hatvā vasudevaṃ ca nandagopaṃ ca durmatim /
GP12vipce_pu:9720: haniṣye pitaraṃ cemam ugrasenaṃ ca durmatim // ViP_5,15.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:9723: tvām ṛte yādavāś caite duṣṭā dānapate mayi /
GP12vipce_pu:9724: eteṣāṃ ca vadhāyāhaṃ yatiṣye 'nukramāt tataḥ // ViP_5,15.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:9725: tato niṣkaṇṭakaṃ sarvaṃ rājyam etad ayādavam /
GP12vipce_pu:9726: praśāsiṣye tvayā tasmān matprītyā vīra gamyatām // ViP_5,15.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:9727: yathā ca māhiṣaṃ sarpir dadhi cāpy upahārya vai /
GP12vipce_pu:9728: gopāḥ samānayanty āśu tvayā vācyās tathā tathā // ViP_5,15.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:9731: prītimān abhavat kṛṣṇaṃ śvo drakṣyāmīti satvaraḥ // ViP_5,15.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:9732: tathety uktvā ca rājānaṃ ratham āruhya śobhanam /
GP12vipce_pu:9733: niścakrāma tadā puryā mathurāyā madhupriyaḥ // ViP_5,15.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:9741: gopyaś ca bhayasaṃvignā govindaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ // ViP_5,16.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:9742: trāhi trāhīti govindaḥ śrutvā teṣāṃ tadā vacaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:9745: alaṃ trāsena gopālāḥ keśinaḥ kiṃ bhayāturaiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:9749: ehy ehi duṣṭa kṛṣṇo 'haṃ pūṣṇor iva pinākadhṛt /
GP12vipce_pu:9750: pātayiṣyāmi daśanān vadanād akhilāṃs tava // ViP_5,16.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:9751: ity uktvāsphoṭya govindaḥ keśinaḥ saṃmukhaṃ yayau /
GP12vipce_pu:9752: vivṛtāsyas tu so 'py enaṃ daiteyāśva upādravat // ViP_5,16.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:9753: bāhum ābhoginaṃ kṛtvā mukhe tasya janārdanaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:9754: praveśayām āsa tadā keśino duṣṭavājinaḥ // ViP_5,16.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:9756: śātitā daśanāḥ petuḥ sitābhrāvayavā iva // ViP_5,16.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:9758: vināśāya yathā vyādhir āsaṃbhūter upekṣitaḥ // ViP_5,16.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:9759: vipāṭitauṣṭho bahulaṃ saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ vaman // ViP_5,16.12ab //
GP12vipce_pu:9761: cukrośa balavān daityaḥ sāsradeho vicetanaḥ // ViP_5,16ab.12*23 //
GP12vipce_pu:9762: so 'kṣiṇī vivṛte cakre niḥsṛte muktabandhane // ViP_5,16.12cd //
GP12vipce_pu:9764: svedārdragātraḥ śrāntaś ca niryatnaḥ so 'bhavat tataḥ // ViP_5,16.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:9766: nipapāta dvidhābhūto vaidyutena yathā drumaḥ // ViP_5,16.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:9768: keśinas te dvidhābhūte śakale dve virejatuḥ // ViP_5,16.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:9769: hatvā tu keśinaṃ kṛṣṇo gopālair muditair vṛtaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:9770: anāyastatanuḥ svastho hasaṃs tatraiva tasthivān // ViP_5,16.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:9771: tato gopyaś ca gopāś ca hate keśini vismitāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:9775: sādhu sādhu jagannātha līlayaiva yad acyuta /
GP12vipce_pu:9776: nihato 'yaṃ tvayā keśī kleśadas tridivaukasām // ViP_5,16.19 //
GP12vipce_pu:9778: avṛttapūrvam anyatra draṣṭuṃ svargād upāgataḥ // ViP_5,16.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:9780: yāni tair vismitaṃ cetas toṣam etena me gatam // ViP_5,16.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:9781: turagasyāsya śakro 'pi kṛṣṇa devāś ca bibhyati /
GP12vipce_pu:9783: yasmāt tvayaiṣa duṣṭātmā hataḥ keśī janārdana /
GP12vipce_pu:9784: tasmāt keśavanāmnā tvaṃ loke khyāto bhaviṣyasi // ViP_5,16.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:9785: svasty astu te gamiṣyāmi kaṃsayuddhe 'dhunā punaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:9791: so 'haṃ yāsyāmi govinda devakāryaṃ mahat kṛtam /
GP12vipce_pu:9792: tvayā sabhājitaś cāhaṃ svasti te 'stu vrajāmy aham // ViP_5,16.27 //
GP12vipce_pu:9793: nārade tu gate kṛṣṇaḥ saha gopair avismitaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:9799: cintayām āsa cākrūro nāsti dhanyataro mayā /
GP12vipce_pu:9800: yo 'ham aṃśāvatīrṇasya mukhaṃ drakṣyāmi cakriṇaḥ // ViP_5,17.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:9801: adya me saphalaṃ janma suprabhātā ca me niśā /
GP12vipce_pu:9802: yad unnidrābjapatrākṣaṃ viṣṇor drakṣyāmy ahaṃ mukham // ViP_5,17.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:9804: adya me saphale netre adya me saphalā giraḥ // ViP_5,17.3*24:1 //
GP12vipce_pu:9805: yan me parasparālāpo dṛṣṭvā viṣṇuṃ bhaviṣyati // ViP_5,17.3*24:2 //
GP12vipce_pu:9806: pāpaṃ harati yat puṃsāṃ smṛtaṃ saṃkalpanāmayam /
GP12vipce_pu:9807: tat puṇḍarīkanayanaṃ viṣṇor drakṣyāmy ahaṃ mukham // ViP_5,17.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:9808: nirjagmuś ca yato vedā vedāṅgāny akhilāni ca /
GP12vipce_pu:9809: drakṣyāmi tat paraṃ dhāma devānāṃ bhagavanmukham // ViP_5,17.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:9811: ijyate yo 'khilādhāras taṃ drakṣyāmi jagatpatim // ViP_5,17.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:9813: avāpa tam anantādim ahaṃ drakṣyāmi keśavam // ViP_5,17.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:9815: yasya svarūpaṃ jānanti sprakṣyaty aṅgaṃ sa me hariḥ // ViP_5,17.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:9817: yo vitatyāvyayo vyāpī sa vakṣyati mayā saha // ViP_5,17.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:9819: cakāra jagato yo 'jaḥ so 'dya mām ālapiṣyati // ViP_5,17.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:9820: sāmprataṃ ca jagatsvāmī kāryam ātmahṛdi sthitam /
GP12vipce_pu:9821: kartuṃ manuṣyatāṃ prāptaḥ svecchādehadhṛg avyayaḥ // ViP_5,17.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:9823: so 'vatīrṇo jagatyarthe mām akrūreti vakṣyati // ViP_5,17.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:9825: yanmāyāṃ nālam uttartuṃ jagat tasmai namo namaḥ // ViP_5,17.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:9826: taraty avidyāṃ vitatāṃ hṛdi yasmin niveśite /
GP12vipce_pu:9827: yogī māyām ameyāya tasmai vidyātmane namaḥ // ViP_5,17.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:9829: vedāntavedibhir viṣṇuḥ procyate yo nato 'smi tam // ViP_5,17.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:9830: yathā tatra jagad dhāmni dhātary etat pratiṣṭhitam /
GP12vipce_pu:9831: sadasat tena satyena mayy asau yātu saumyatām // ViP_5,17.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:9833: puruṣas tam ajaṃ nityaṃ vrajāmi śaraṇaṃ harim // ViP_5,17.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:9836: akrūro gokulaṃ prāptaḥ kiṃcit sūrye virājati // ViP_5,17.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:9837: sa dadarśa tadā tatra kṛṣṇam ādohane gavām /
GP12vipce_pu:9846: tasyānu balabhadraṃ ca dadarśa yadunandanaḥ // ViP_5,17.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:9851: etat tat paramaṃ dhāma tad etat paramaṃ padam /
GP12vipce_pu:9853: sāphalyam akṣṇor yugam etad atra dṛṣṭe jagaddhātari yātam uccaiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:9854: apy aṅgam etad bhagavatprasādād datte 'ṅgasaṅge phalavan mama syāt // ViP_5,17.27 //
GP12vipce_pu:9855: apy eṣa pṛṣṭhe mama hastapadmaṃ kariṣyati śrīmadanantamūrtiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:9858: cakraṃ ghnatā daityapater hṛtāni daityāṅganānāṃ nayanāñjanāni // ViP_5,17.29 //
GP12vipce_pu:9859: yatrāmbu vinyasya balir manojñān avāpa bhogān vasudhātalasthaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:9860: tathāmaratvaṃ tridaśādhipatyaṃ manvantaraṃ pūrṇam apetaśatruḥ // ViP_5,17.30 //
GP12vipce_pu:9861: apy eṣa māṃ kaṃsaparigraheṇa doṣāspadībhūtam adoṣaduṣṭam /
GP12vipce_pu:9862: kartāvamānopahataṃ dhig astu taj janmanaḥ sādhu bahiṣkṛto yaḥ // ViP_5,17.31 //
GP12vipce_pu:9864: kiṃ vā jagaty atra samastapuṃsām ajñātam asyāsti hṛdi sthitasya // ViP_5,17.32 //
GP12vipce_pu:9865: tasmād ahaṃ bhaktivinamracetā vrajāmi sarveśvaram īśvarāṇām /
GP12vipce_pu:9869: cintayann iti govindam upagamya sa yādavaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:9870: akrūro 'smīti caraṇau nanāma śirasā hareḥ // ViP_5,18.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:9872: saṃspṛśyākṛṣya ca prītyā sugāḍhaṃ pariṣasvaje // ViP_5,18.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:9874: tataḥ praviṣṭau saṃhṛṣṭau tam ādāyātmamandiram // ViP_5,18.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:9876: bhuktabhojyo yathānyāyam ācacakṣe tatas tayoḥ // ViP_5,18.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:9878: yathā ca devakī devī dānavena durātmanā // ViP_5,18.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:9879: ugrasene yathā kaṃsaḥ sudurātmā ca vartate /
GP12vipce_pu:9880: yaṃ caivārthaṃ samuddiśya sa kaṃsena visarjitaḥ // ViP_5,18.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:9881: tat sarvaṃ vistarāc chrutvā bhagavān keśisūdanaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:9882: uvācākhilam apy etaj jñātaṃ dānapate mayā // ViP_5,18.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:9883: kariṣye ca mahābhāga yad atraupayikaṃ matam /
GP12vipce_pu:9884: vicintyaṃ nānyathaitat te viddhi kaṃsaṃ hataṃ mayā // ViP_5,18.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:9885: ahaṃ rāmaś ca mathurāṃ śvo yāsyāvaḥ samaṃ tvayā /
GP12vipce_pu:9886: gopavṛddhāś ca yāsyanti hy ādāyopāyanaṃ bahu // ViP_5,18.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:9887: niśeyaṃ nīyatāṃ vīra na cintāṃ kartum arhasi /
GP12vipce_pu:9891: suṣvāpa balabhadraś ca nandagopagṛhe tataḥ // ViP_5,18.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:9893: akrūreṇa samaṃ gantum udyatau mathurāṃ prati // ViP_5,18.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:9896: mathurāṃ prāpya govindaḥ kathaṃ gokulam eṣyati /
GP12vipce_pu:9899: cittam asya kathaṃ bhūyo grāmyagopīṣu yāsyati // ViP_5,18.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:9903: nāgarīṇām atīvaitat kaṭākṣekṣitam eva ca // ViP_5,18.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:9904: grāmyo harir ayaṃ tāsāṃ vilāsanigaḍair yutaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:9905: bhavatīnāṃ punaḥ pārśvaṃ kayā yuktyā sameṣyati // ViP_5,18.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:9906: eṣaeṣa ratham āruhya mathurāṃ yāti keśavaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:9908: kiṃ na vetti nṛśaṃso 'yam anurāgaparaṃ janam /
GP12vipce_pu:9909: yenemam akṣṇor āhlādaṃ nayaty anyatra no harim // ViP_5,18.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:9911: ratham āruhya govindas tvaryatām asya vāraṇe // ViP_5,18.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:9912: gurūṇām agrato vaktuṃ kiṃ bravīṣi na naḥ kṣamam /
GP12vipce_pu:9913: guravaḥ kiṃ kariṣyanti dagdhānāṃ virahāgninā // ViP_5,18.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:9918: dhanyās te pathi ye kṛṣṇam ito yānty anivāritāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:9922: ko nu svapnaḥ sabhāgyābhir dṛṣṭas tābhir adhokṣajam /
GP12vipce_pu:9927: dhanyās te pathi ye kṛṣṇaṃ yāntaṃ saumyavapur harim // ViP_5,18.28*25:1 //
GP12vipce_pu:9930: śaithilyam upayānty āśu kareṣu valayāny api // ViP_5,18.29 //
GP12vipce_pu:9932: evam ārtāsu yoṣitsu ghṛṇā kasya na jāyate // ViP_5,18.30 //
GP12vipce_pu:9934: akrūra tvaṃ mahābāho vada vācātisaumyayā // ViP_5,18.30*26:1 //
GP12vipce_pu:9935: asya gopījanasyārtiṃ kimarthaṃ kartum arhasi // ViP_5,18.30*26:2 //
GP12vipce_pu:9936: kīdṛgvidhā kṛtāsmābhir nikṛtis te janeśvara // ViP_5,18.30*26:3 //
GP12vipce_pu:9937: vidhātur vā mahābāho tasya kṛṣṇasya vā hareḥ // ViP_5,18.30*26:4 //
GP12vipce_pu:9938: balabhadro vārayituṃ necchate dhruvam apy ayam // ViP_5,18.30*26:5 //
GP12vipce_pu:9939: evam ārtāsu yoṣitsu pralapantīṣv itas tataḥ // ViP_5,18.30*26:6 //
GP12vipce_pu:9940: ratham āsthāya gacchantam idam ūcur varāṅganāḥ // ViP_5,18.30*26:7 //
GP12vipce_pu:9942: dūrībhūto harir yena so 'pi reṇur na lakṣyate // ViP_5,18.31 //
GP12vipce_pu:9945: tatyāja vrajabhūbhāgaṃ saha rāmeṇa keśavaḥ // ViP_5,18.32 //
GP12vipce_pu:9948: athāha kṛṣṇam akrūro bhavadbhyāṃ tāvad āsyatām /
GP12vipce_pu:9949: yāvat karomi kālindyām āhnikārhaṇam ambhasi // ViP_5,18.34 //
GP12vipce_pu:9950: tathety uktas tataḥ snātaḥ svācāntaḥ sa mahāmatiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:9951: dadhyau brahma paraṃ vipra praviśya yamunājale // ViP_5,18.35 //
GP12vipce_pu:9957: cārukuṇḍalinaṃ mattam antar jalatale sthitam // ViP_5,18.38 //
GP12vipce_pu:9967: so 'cintayad rathāc chīghraṃ katham atrāgatāv iti // ViP_5,18.43 //
GP12vipce_pu:9968: vivakṣoḥ stambhayām āsa vācaṃ tasya janārdanaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:9969: tato niṣkramya salilād ratham abhyāgataḥ punaḥ // ViP_5,18.44 //
GP12vipce_pu:9972: nimagnaś ca punas toye sa dadarśa tathaiva tau /
GP12vipce_pu:9974: tato vijñātasadbhāvaḥ sa tu dānapatis tadā /
GP12vipce_pu:9982: bhūtātmā cendriyātmā ca pradhānātmā tathā bhavān /
GP12vipce_pu:9983: ātmā ca paramātmā ca tvam ekaḥ pañcadhā sthitaḥ // ViP_5,18.50 //
GP12vipce_pu:9989: tad brahma paramaṃ nityam avikāri bhavān aja // ViP_5,18.53 //
GP12vipce_pu:9992: sarvārthās tvam aja vikalpanābhir etad devādyaṃ jagad akhilaṃ tvam eva viśvam /
GP12vipce_pu:9993: viśvātmaṃs tvam iti vikārabhāvahīnaḥ sarvasmin na hi bhavato 'sti kiṃcid anyat // ViP_5,18.55 //
GP12vipce_pu:9994: tvaṃ brahmā paśupatir aryamā vidhātā dhātā tvaṃ tridaśapatiḥ samīraṇo 'gniḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:9995: toyeśo dhanapatir antakas tvam eko bhinnārthair jagad abhipāsi śaktibhedaiḥ // ViP_5,18.56 //
GP12vipce_pu:9996: viśvaṃ bhavān sṛjati sūryagabhastirūpo viśvaṃ ca te guṇamayo 'yam aja prapañcaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:9997: rūpaṃ paraṃ sad iti vācakam akṣaraṃ yaj jñānātmane sadasate praṇato 'smi tasmai // ViP_5,18.57 //
GP12vipce_pu:9998: oṃ namo vāsudevāya namaḥ saṃkarṣaṇāya te /
GP12vipce_pu:9999: pradyumnāya namas tubhyam aniruddhāya te namaḥ // ViP_5,18.58 //
GP12vipce_pu:10002: evam antar jale viṣṇum abhiṣṭūya sa yādavaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:10003: arcayām āsa sarveśaṃ puṣpadhūpair manomayaiḥ // ViP_5,19.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:10005: brahmabhūte ciraṃ sthitvā virarāma samādhitaḥ // ViP_5,19.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:10007: ājagāma rathaṃ bhūyo nirgamya yamunāmbhasaḥ // ViP_5,19.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:10008: rāmakṛṣṇau ca dadṛśe yathāpūrvaṃ rathe sthitau /
GP12vipce_pu:10009: vismitākṣas tadākrūras taṃ ca kṛṣṇo 'bhyabhāṣata // ViP_5,19.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:10010: nūnaṃ te dṛṣṭam āścaryam akrūra yamunājale /
GP12vipce_pu:10013: antar jale yad āścaryaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tatra mayācyuta /
GP12vipce_pu:10014: tad atrāpi hi paśyāmi mūrtimat purataḥ sthitam // ViP_5,19.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:10015: jagad etan mahāścaryaṃ rūpaṃ yasya mahātmanaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:10017: tat kim etena mathurāṃ prayāmo madhusūdana /
GP12vipce_pu:10018: bibhemi kaṃsād dhig janma parapiṇḍopajīvinām // ViP_5,19.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:10019: ity uktvā codayām āsa tān hayān vātaraṃhasaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:10020: saṃprāptaś cātisāyāhne so 'krūro mathurāṃ purīm // ViP_5,19.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:10021: vilokya mathurāṃ rāmaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ cāha sa yādavaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:10022: padbhyāṃ yātaṃ mahāvīryau rathenaiko viśāmy aham // ViP_5,19.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:10023: gantavyaṃ vasudevasya na bhavadbhyāṃ tathā gṛham /
GP12vipce_pu:10024: yuvayor hi kṛte vṛddhaḥ sa kaṃsena nirasyate // ViP_5,19.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:10026: ity uktvā praviveśātha so 'krūro mathurāṃ purīm /
GP12vipce_pu:10027: praviṣṭau rāmakṛṣṇau ca rājamārgam upāgatau // ViP_5,19.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:10028: strībhir naraiś ca sānandaṃ locanair abhivīkṣitau /
GP12vipce_pu:10029: jagmatur līlayā vīrau mattau bālagajāv iva // ViP_5,19.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:10030: bhramamāṇau tu tau dṛṣṭvā rajakaṃ raṅgakārakam /
GP12vipce_pu:10035: pātayām āsa kopena rajakasya śiro bhuvi // ViP_5,19.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:10037: kṛṣṇarāmau mudā yuktau mālākāragṛhaṃ gatau // ViP_5,19.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:10039: etau kasya kuto vaitau maitreyācintayat tataḥ // ViP_5,19.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:10041: sa tarkayām āsa tadā bhuvaṃ devāv upāgatau // ViP_5,19.19 //
GP12vipce_pu:10043: bhuvaṃ viṣṭabhya hastābhyāṃ pasparśa śirasā mahīm // ViP_5,19.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:10045: dhanyo 'ham arcayiṣyāmīty āha tau mālyajīvakaḥ // ViP_5,19.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:10047: cārūṇy etāny athaitāni pradadau sa vilobhayan // ViP_5,19.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:10049: dadau puṣpāṇi cārūṇi gandhavanty amalāni ca // ViP_5,19.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:10051: śrīs tvāṃ matsaṃśrayā bhadra na kadācit tyajiṣyati // ViP_5,19.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:10052: balahānir na te saumya dhanahānis tathaiva ca /
GP12vipce_pu:10053: yāvad dināni tāvac ca na naśiṣyati saṃtatiḥ // ViP_5,19.25 //
GP12vipce_pu:10054: bhuktvā ca bhogān vipulāṃs tvam ante matprasādajam /
GP12vipce_pu:10055: mamānusmaraṇaṃ prāpya divyaṃ lokam avāpsyasi // ViP_5,19.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:10056: dharme manaś ca te bhadra sarvakālaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GP12vipce_pu:10059: saṃprāpsyati mahābhāga yāvat sūryo bhaviṣyati // ViP_5,19.28 //
GP12vipce_pu:10067: tām āha lalitaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ kasyedam anulepanam /
GP12vipce_pu:10069: sakāmenaiva sā proktā sānurāgā hariṃ prati /
GP12vipce_pu:10070: prāha sā lalitaṃ kubjā taddarśanabalātkṛtā // ViP_5,20.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:10073: nānyapiṣṭaṃ hi kaṃsasya prītaye hy anulepanam /
GP12vipce_pu:10079: śrutvaitad āha sā kubjā gṛhyatām iti sādaram /
GP12vipce_pu:10080: anulepanaṃ ca dadau gātrayogyam athobhayoḥ // ViP_5,20.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:10085: cakarṣa padbhyāṃ ca tadā ṛjutvaṃ keśavo 'nayat /
GP12vipce_pu:10086: tataḥ sā ṛjutāṃ prāptā yoṣitām abhavad varā // ViP_5,20.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:10088: vastre pragṛhya govindaṃ vraja gehaṃ mameti vai // ViP_5,20.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:10090: evam uktas tayā śaurī rāmasyālokya cānanam // ViP_5,20.11*27:1 //
GP12vipce_pu:10091: prahasya kubjāṃ tām āha naikavakrām aninditām // ViP_5,20.11*27:2 //
GP12vipce_pu:10093: ity uktavantīm ālokya prahasan harir abravīt // ViP_5,20.11*28 //
GP12vipce_pu:10094: āyāsye bhavatīgeham iti tāṃ prahasan hariḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:10098: āyogavaṃ dhanūratnaṃ tābhyāṃ pṛṣṭais tu rakṣibhiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:10099: ākhyāte sahasā kṛṣṇo gṛhītvāpūrayad dhanuḥ // ViP_5,20.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:10100: tataḥ pūrayatā tena bhajyamānaṃ balād dhanuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:10101: cakāra sumahāśabdaṃ mathurā yena pūritā // ViP_5,20.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:10102: anuyuktau tatas tau tu bhagne dhanuṣi rakṣibhiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:10105: bhagnaṃ śrutvātha kaṃso 'pi prāha cāṇūramuṣṭikau // ViP_5,20.17 //
