GP12vipce_pu:12438: manaḥśilābhāḥ kecid vai haritālanibhāḥ pare // ViP_6,3.34*5:2 //
GP12vipce_pu:12443: varṣantas te mahāsārās tam agnim atibhairavam // ViP_6,3.37ab //
GP12vipce_pu:12445: śamayanti jagat sarvaṃ varṣanti munisattama // ViP_6,3.37ab*6:1 //
GP12vipce_pu:12446: hastihastanibhābhis te dhārābhir aniśaṃ tadā // ViP_6,3.37ab*6:2 //
GP12vipce_pu:12448: naṣṭe cāgnau śataṃ te 'pi varṣāṇām adhikaṃ ghanāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12449: plāvayanto jagat sarvaṃ varṣanti munisattama // ViP_6,3.38 //
GP12vipce_pu:12451: bhuvarlokaṃ tathaivordhvaṃ plāvayanti divaṃ dvija // ViP_6,3.39 //
GP12vipce_pu:12453: varṣanti te mahāmeghā varṣāṇām adhikaṃ śatam // ViP_6,3.40 //
GP12vipce_pu:12455: evaṃ bhavati kalpānte samastaṃ munisattama // ViP_6,3.40*7:1 //
GP12vipce_pu:12460: ekārṇavaṃ bhavaty etat trailokyam akhilaṃ tataḥ // ViP_6,4.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:12461: mukhaniśvāsajo viṣṇor vāyus tāñ jaladāṃs tataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12462: nāśayan vāti maitreya varṣāṇām aparaṃ śatam // ViP_6,4.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:12464: anādir ādir viśvasya pītvā vāyum aśeṣataḥ // ViP_6,4.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:12466: brahmarūpadharaḥ śete bhagavān ādikṛd dhariḥ // ViP_6,4.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:12472: nimittaṃ tatra yac chete brahmarūpadharo hariḥ // ViP_6,4.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:12473: yadā jāgarti sarvātmā sa tadā ceṣṭate jagat /
GP12vipce_pu:12476: ekārṇave kṛte loke tāvatī rātrir iṣyate // ViP_6,4.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:12477: tataḥ prabuddho rātryante punaḥ sṛṣṭiṃ karoty ajaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12478: brahmasvarūpadhṛg viṣṇur yathā te kathitaṃ purā // ViP_6,4.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:12480: naimittikas te kathitaḥ prākṛtaṃ śṛṇvataḥ param // ViP_6,4.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:12482: samasteṣv eva lokeṣu pātāleṣv akhileṣu ca // ViP_6,4.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:12485: āpo grasanti vai pūrvaṃ bhūmer gandhātmakaṃ guṇam /
GP12vipce_pu:12486: āttagandhā tato bhūmiḥ pralayatvāya kalpate // ViP_6,4.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:12488: āpas tadā pravṛddhās tu vegavatyo mahāsvanāḥ // ViP_6,4.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:12490: salilenaivormimatā lokāṃs tāṃs tān samantataḥ // ViP_6,4.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:12492: vyāptam evābhavat sarvaṃ jagad etad dvijottama // ViP_6,4.16*8 //
GP12vipce_pu:12493: apām api guṇo yas tu jyotiṣā pīyate tu saḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12494: naśyanty āpas tatas tāś ca rasatanmātrasaṃkṣayāt // ViP_6,4.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:12495: tataś cāpo hṛtarasā jyotiṣaṃ prāpnuvanti vai /
GP12vipce_pu:12496: agnyavasthe tu salile tejasā sarvato vṛte // ViP_6,4.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:12497: sa cāgniḥ sarvato vyāpya ādatte taj jalaṃ tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:12498: sarvam āpūryate 'rcibhis tadā jagad idaṃ śanaiḥ // ViP_6,4.19 //
GP12vipce_pu:12499: arcirbhiḥ saṃvṛte tasmiṃs tiryag ūrdhvam adhas tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:12500: jyotiṣo 'pi paraṃ rūpaṃ vāyur atti prabhākaram // ViP_6,4.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:12503: praśāmyati tadā jyotir vāyur dodhūyate mahān /
GP12vipce_pu:12504: nirāloke tadā loke vāyvavasthe ca tejasi // ViP_6,4.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:12505: tatas tu mūlam āsādya vāyuḥ saṃbhavam ātmanaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12506: ūrdhvaṃ cādhaś ca tiryak ca dodhavīti diśo daśa // ViP_6,4.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:12507: vāyor api guṇaṃ sparśam ākāśaṃ grasate tataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12508: praśāmyati tato vāyuḥ khaṃ tu tiṣṭhaty anāvṛtam // ViP_6,4.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:12509: arūpam arasasparśam agandhaṃ na ca mūrtimat /
GP12vipce_pu:12510: sarvam āpūrayac caiva sumahat tat prakāśate // ViP_6,4.25 //
GP12vipce_pu:12512: śabdamātraṃ tadākāśaṃ sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati // ViP_6,4.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:12513: tataḥ śabdaguṇaṃ tasya bhūtādir grasate punaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12515: abhimānātmako hy eṣa bhūtādis tāmasaḥ smṛtaḥ // ViP_6,4.27 //
GP12vipce_pu:12516: bhūtādiṃ grasate cāpi mahān vai buddhilakṣaṇaḥ // ViP_6,4.28 //
GP12vipce_pu:12517: urvī mahāṃś ca jagataḥ prānte 'ntar bāhyatas tathā // ViP_6,4.29 //
GP12vipce_pu:12518: evaṃ sapta mahābuddheḥ kramāt prakṛtayas tu vai /
GP12vipce_pu:12519: pratyāhāre tu tāḥ sarvāḥ praviśanti parasparam // ViP_6,4.30 //
GP12vipce_pu:12520: yenedam āvṛtaṃ sarvam aṇḍam apsu pralīyate /
GP12vipce_pu:12522: udakāvaraṇaṃ yat tu jyotiṣā pīyate tu tat /
GP12vipce_pu:12523: jyotir vāyau layaṃ yāti yāty ākāśe samīraṇaḥ // ViP_6,4.32 //
GP12vipce_pu:12524: ākāśaṃ caiva bhūtādir grasate taṃ tathā mahān /
GP12vipce_pu:12525: mahāntam ebhiḥ sahitaṃ prakṛtir grasate dvija // ViP_6,4.33 //
GP12vipce_pu:12527: procyate prakṛtir hetuḥ pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ param // ViP_6,4.34 //
GP12vipce_pu:12529: vyaktasvarūpam avyakte tasmin maitreya līyate // ViP_6,4.35 //
GP12vipce_pu:12530: ekaḥ śuddho 'kṣaro nityaḥ sarvavyāpī tathā pumān /
GP12vipce_pu:12531: so 'py aṃśaḥ sarvabhūtasya maitreya paramātmanaḥ // ViP_6,4.36 //
GP12vipce_pu:12533: sattāmātrātmake jñeye jñānātmany ātmanaḥ pare // ViP_6,4.37 //
GP12vipce_pu:12534: tad brahma tat paraṃ dhāma paramātmā sa ceśvaraḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12535: sa viṣṇuḥ sarvam evedaṃ yato nāvartate yatiḥ // ViP_6,4.38 //
GP12vipce_pu:12537: puruṣaś cāpy ubhāv etau līyete paramātmani // ViP_6,4.39 //
GP12vipce_pu:12539: viṣṇur nāmnā sa vedeṣu vedānteṣu ca gīyate // ViP_6,4.40 //
GP12vipce_pu:12540: pravṛttaṃ ca nivṛttaṃ ca dvividhaṃ karma vaidikam /
GP12vipce_pu:12541: tābhyām ubhābhyāṃ puruṣaiḥ sarvamūrtiḥ sa ijyate // ViP_6,4.41 //
GP12vipce_pu:12542: ṛgyajuḥsāmabhir mārgaiḥ pravṛttair ijyate hy asau /
GP12vipce_pu:12545: nivṛtte yogibhir mārge viṣṇur muktiphalapradaḥ // ViP_6,4.43 //
GP12vipce_pu:12546: hrasvadīrghaplutair yat tu kiṃcid vastv abhidhīyate /
GP12vipce_pu:12547: yac ca vācām aviṣaye tat sarvaṃ viṣṇur avyayaḥ // ViP_6,4.44 //
GP12vipce_pu:12548: vyaktaṃ sa eva cāvyaktaṃ sa eva puruṣo 'vyayaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12549: paramātmā ca viśvātmā viśvarūpadharo hariḥ // ViP_6,4.45 //
GP12vipce_pu:12551: puruṣaś cāpi maitreya vyāpiny avyāhatātmani // ViP_6,4.46 //
GP12vipce_pu:12552: dviparārdhātmakaḥ kālaḥ kathito yo mayā tava /
GP12vipce_pu:12553: tad ahas tasya maitreya viṣṇor īśasya kathyate // ViP_6,4.47 //
GP12vipce_pu:12554: vyakte ca prakṛtau līne prakṛtyāṃ puruṣe tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:12555: tatra sthite niśā cānyā tatpramāṇā mahāmune // ViP_6,4.48 //
GP12vipce_pu:12556: naivāhas tasya na niśā nityasya paramātmanaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12557: upacāras tathāpy eṣa tasyeśasya dvijocyate // ViP_6,4.49 //
GP12vipce_pu:12558: ity eṣa tava maitreya kathitaḥ prākṛto layaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12559: ātyantikam atho brahman nibodha pratisaṃcaram // ViP_6,4.50 //
GP12vipce_pu:12564: ādhyātmiko vai dvividhaḥ śārīro mānasas tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:12565: śārīro bahubhir bhedair bhidyate śrūyatāṃ ca saḥ // ViP_6,5.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:12569: bhidyate dehajas tāpo mānasaṃ śrotum arhasi // ViP_6,5.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:12573: ity evamādibhir bhedais tāpo hy ādhyātmikaḥ smṛtaḥ // ViP_6,5.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:12575: sarīsṛpādyaiś ca nṛṇāṃ janyante cādhibhautikaḥ // ViP_6,5.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:12579: duḥkhaṃ sahasraśo bhedair bhidyate munisattama // ViP_6,5.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:12591: kleśair niṣkrāntim āpnoti jaṭharān mātur āturaḥ // ViP_6,5.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:12593: vijñānabhraṃśam āpnoti jātaś ca munisattama // ViP_6,5.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:12594: kaṇṭakair iva tunnāṅgaḥ krakacair iva dāritaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12595: pūtivraṇān nipatito dharaṇyāṃ kṛmiko yathā // ViP_6,5.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:12603: na jānāti kutaḥ ko 'haṃ kvāhaṃ gantā kimātmakaḥ // ViP_6,5.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:12604: kena bandhena baddho 'haṃ kāraṇaṃ kim akāraṇam /
GP12vipce_pu:12605: kiṃ kāryaṃ kim akāryaṃ vā kiṃ vācyaṃ kiṃ ca nocyate // ViP_6,5.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:12606: ko 'dharmaḥ kaś ca vai dharmaḥ kasmin varte 'thavā katham /
GP12vipce_pu:12607: kiṃ kartavyam akartavyaṃ kiṃ vā kiṃ guṇadoṣavat // ViP_6,5.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:12611: ajñānināṃ pravartante karmalopās tato dvija // ViP_6,5.25 //
GP12vipce_pu:12612: narakaṃ karmaṇāṃ lopāt phalam āhur maharṣayaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12613: tasmād ajñānināṃ duḥkham iha cāmutra cottamam // ViP_6,5.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:12631: saṃsmaran yauvane dīrghaṃ niḥśvasity atitāpitaḥ // ViP_6,5.35 //
GP12vipce_pu:12633: maraṇe yāni duḥkhāni prāpnoti śṛṇu tāny api // ViP_6,5.36 //
GP12vipce_pu:12635: muhur glāniḥ paravaśo muhur jñānalavānvitaḥ // ViP_6,5.37 //
GP12vipce_pu:12643: tāpena mahatā vyāptas tṛṣā cārtas tathā kṣudhā // ViP_6,5.41 //
GP12vipce_pu:12645: tataś ca yātanādehaṃ kleśena pratipadyate // ViP_6,5.42 //
GP12vipce_pu:12646: etāny anyāni cogrāṇi duḥkhāni maraṇe nṛṇām /
GP12vipce_pu:12647: śṛṇuṣva narake yāni prāpyante puruṣair mṛtaiḥ // ViP_6,5.43 //
GP12vipce_pu:12651: pratyekaṃ narake yāś ca yātanā dvija duḥsahāḥ // ViP_6,5.45 //
GP12vipce_pu:12653: kuṭhāraiḥ kṛtyamānānāṃ bhūmau cāpi nikhanyatām // ViP_6,5.46 //
GP12vipce_pu:12659: prāpyante nārakair vipra teṣāṃ saṃkhyā na vidyate // ViP_6,5.49 //
GP12vipce_pu:12661: svarge 'pi pātabhītasya kṣayiṣṇor nāsti nirvṛtiḥ // ViP_6,5.50 //
GP12vipce_pu:12662: punaś ca garbhe bhavati jāyate ca punar naraḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12663: garbhe vilīyate bhūyo jāyamāno 'stam eti ca // ViP_6,5.51 //
GP12vipce_pu:12665: madhyamaṃ vā vayaḥ prāpya vārddhake vā dhruvā mṛtiḥ // ViP_6,5.52 //
GP12vipce_pu:12666: yāvaj jīvati tāvac ca duḥkhair nānāvidhaiḥ plutaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12668: dravyanāśe tathotpattau pālane ca tathā nṛṇām /
GP12vipce_pu:12670: yad yat prītikaraṃ puṃsāṃ vastu maitreya jāyate /
GP12vipce_pu:12671: tad eva duḥkhavṛkṣasya bījatvam upagacchati // ViP_6,5.55 //
GP12vipce_pu:12673: kriyate na tathā bhūri sukhaṃ puṃsāṃ yathāsukham // ViP_6,5.56 //
GP12vipce_pu:12675: vimuktipādapacchāyām ṛte kutra sukhaṃ nṛṇām // ViP_6,5.57 //
GP12vipce_pu:12680: tasmāt tatprāptaye yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ paṇḍitair naraiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12681: tatprāptihetur jñānaṃ ca karma coktaṃ mahāmune // ViP_6,5.60 //
GP12vipce_pu:12682: āgamotthaṃ vivekāc ca dvidhā jñānaṃ tathocyate /
GP12vipce_pu:12685: yathā sūryas tathā jñānaṃ yad viprarṣe vivekajam // ViP_6,5.62 //
GP12vipce_pu:12686: manur apy āha vedārthaṃ smṛtvā yan munisattama /
GP12vipce_pu:12687: tad etac chrūyatām atra saṃbandhe gadato mama // ViP_6,5.63 //
GP12vipce_pu:12688: dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma paraṃ ca yat /
GP12vipce_pu:12690: dve vidye veditavye vai iti cātharvaṇī śrutiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12692: yat tad avyaktam ajaram acintyam ajam avyayam /
GP12vipce_pu:12695: vyāpy avyāptaṃ yataḥ sarvaṃ taṃ vai paśyanti sūrayaḥ // ViP_6,5.67 //
GP12vipce_pu:12696: tad brahma tat paraṃ dhāma tad dhyeyaṃ mokṣakāṅks.iṇām /
GP12vipce_pu:12697: śrutivākyoditaṃ sūkṣmaṃ tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // ViP_6,5.68 //
GP12vipce_pu:12700: evaṃ nigaditārthasya sa tattvaṃ tasya tattvataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12701: jñāyate yena taj jñānaṃ param anyat trayīmayam // ViP_6,5.70 //
GP12vipce_pu:12703: pūjāyāṃ bhagavacchabdaḥ kriyate hy aupacārikaḥ // ViP_6,5.71 //
GP12vipce_pu:12707: netā gamayitā sraṣṭā gakārārthas tathā mune // ViP_6,5.73 //
GP12vipce_pu:12709: jñānavairāgyayoś caiva ṣaṇṇāṃ bhaga itīraṇā // ViP_6,5.74 //
GP12vipce_pu:12711: sa ca bhūteṣv aśeṣeṣu vakārārthas tato 'vyayaḥ // ViP_6,5.75 //
GP12vipce_pu:12712: evam eṣa mahāśabdo bhagavān iti sattama /
GP12vipce_pu:12715: śabdo 'yaṃ nopacāreṇa anyatra hy upacārataḥ // ViP_6,5.77 //
GP12vipce_pu:12716: utpattiṃ pralayaṃ caiva bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim /
GP12vipce_pu:12717: vetti vidyām avidyāṃ ca sa vācyo bhagavān iti // ViP_6,5.78 //
GP12vipce_pu:12721: bhūteṣu ca sa sarvātmā vāsudevas tataḥ smṛtaḥ // ViP_6,5.80 //
GP12vipce_pu:12724: bhūteṣu vasate so 'ntar vasanty atra ca tāni yat /
GP12vipce_pu:12725: dhātā vidhātā jagatāṃ vāsudevas tataḥ prabhuḥ // ViP_6,5.82 //
GP12vipce_pu:12726: For 82, B2 subst.; while B1 ins. after 82
GP12vipce_pu:12727: bhūteṣu yo 'ntar vasati sma nityaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāni ca yatra santi /
GP12vipce_pu:12728: dhātā vidhātā parameśvaraś ca sa vāsudevo na yataḥ paro 'nyaḥ // ViP_6,5.82*9 //
GP12vipce_pu:12729: sa sarvabhūtaprakṛtiṃ vikāraṃ guṇādidoṣāṃś ca mune vyatītaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12734: paraḥ parāṇāṃ sakalā na yatra kleśādayaḥ santi parāvareśe // ViP_6,5.85 //
GP12vipce_pu:12736: sarveśvaraḥ sarvadṛk sarvavettā samastaśaktiḥ parameśvarākhyaḥ // ViP_6,5.86 //
GP12vipce_pu:12737: saṃjñāyate yena tad astadoṣaṃ śuddhaṃ paraṃ nirmalam ekarūpam /
GP12vipce_pu:12738: saṃdṛśyate vāpy avagamyate vā taj jñānam ajñānam ato 'nyad uktam // ViP_6,5.87 //
GP12vipce_pu:12740: vyarthaṃ janmaśataṃ tasya śrutvā vaktraparāṅmukhaḥ // ViP_6,5.87*10:1 //
GP12vipce_pu:12742: niṣphalaṃ jīvitaṃ tasya asya jñānaparāṅmukhaḥ // ViP_6,5.87*10:3 //
GP12vipce_pu:12746: tatprāptikāraṇaṃ brahma tad etad iti paṭhyate // ViP_6,6.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:12747: svādhyāyād yogam āsīta yogāt svādhyāyam ācaret /
GP12vipce_pu:12750: na māṃsacakṣuṣā draṣṭuṃ brahmabhūtaḥ sa śakyate // ViP_6,6.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:12752: bhagavaṃs tam ahaṃ yogaṃ jñātum icchāmi taṃ vada /
GP12vipce_pu:12756: janakāya purā yogaṃ tathāhaṃ kathayāmi te // ViP_6,6.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:12758: khāṇḍikyaḥ ko 'bhavad brahman ko vā keśidhvajo 'bhavat /
GP12vipce_pu:12759: kathaṃ tayoś ca saṃvādo yogasaṃbandhavān abhūt // ViP_6,6.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:12762: kṛtadhvajaś ca nāmnāsīt sadādhyātmaratir nṛpaḥ // ViP_6,6.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:12767: tāv ubhāv api caivāstāṃ vijigīṣū parasparam /
GP12vipce_pu:12773: brahmavidyām adhiṣṭhāya tartuṃ mṛtyum avidyayā // ViP_6,6.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:12775: dharmadhenuṃ jaghānograḥ śārdūlo vijane vane // ViP_6,6.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:12776: tato rājā hatāṃ jñātvā dhenuṃ vyāghreṇa ṛtvijaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12777: prāyaścittaṃ sa papraccha kim atreti vidhīyate // ViP_6,6.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:12778: te cocur na vayaṃ vidmaḥ kaśeruḥ pṛcchyatām iti /
GP12vipce_pu:12779: kaśerur api tenoktas tatheti prāha bhārgavam // ViP_6,6.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:12780: śunakaṃ pṛccha rājendra nāhaṃ vedmi sa vetsyati /
GP12vipce_pu:12781: sa gatvā tam apṛcchac ca so 'py āha śṛṇu yan mune // ViP_6,6.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:12782: na kaśerur na caivāhaṃ na cānyaḥ sāmprataṃ bhuvi /

GP12vipce_pu:13224: yasmin nyastamatir na yāti narakaṃ svargo 'pi yac cintane vighno yatra niveśitātmamanaso brāhmo 'pi loko 'lpakaḥ /
